I'm also buying an additional 3-year warranty via CostCo (it's $20 cheaper there with a CostCo Membership).All said and done, this is hands down the best consistent TV deal out there. Get it without even hesitating.

Reviews.Title: Mr
Reviews.Author: Dtime
Reviews.Content: Could not get a good picture thru my U Verse connection..way to stretched out in sports viewing. The picture is decent and easy to set up

Reviews.Title: Great bang for my buck!
Reviews.Author: Rhino Seagull
Reviews.Content: I had never heard of the TCL brand, however, I was quite impressed. Picture and colors are spectacular. On-screen menus are intuitive. The 2 year warranty gives me peace of mind. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: BEST BANG FOR YOUR BUCK!!
Reviews.Author: EricUmfress
Reviews.Content: TV was well packaged and shipped promptly. Came with remote, batteries for the remote, manual, cable tie, glass stand and TV. Stand was difficult to mount due to the holes being very tight to the screws, so I had to heat the screws with a lighter, drive them in to make them fit easier, pull them out, then drive them in with the stand...fit very well and holds stand well. It has a little wobble, but It's designed that way to prevent stand from snapping, but it will not lose center of balance.Quality is amazing. This company is relativity unknown, but builds TV's for RCA so you know it meets some serious standards. Picture and Audio are equally AMAZING. The sound rivals the quality of my Phillips Surround Sound and is very fat and deep sounding. Has 5 band EQ for some custom tailoring. Numerous adjustments and controls for Audio and Video. Lots of ins and outs and a very easy to use and efficient remote.In the end...best investment that I have made in a long time...VERY happy with my purchase...would recommend to anyone!!!! BUY THIS!

Reviews.Title: 40 inch tcl tv
Reviews.Author: joeycan
Reviews.Content: i was worried when i first bought the tv , but my fears were unwarranted. the sound and clearity are great, and the 2 year warrantty is a plus

Reviews.Title: TCL's awesome 40" TV
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for two days now, and so far, it is awesome!First of all, the picture quality is excellent, especially after adjustments to fit my taste. The picture is clear, sharp, free of dead or stuck pixels, and the backlighting is even. It also has a nice solid picture, unlike many other cheap LCD screens which show obvious distortion and a kind of "swirly" pattern. The color quality isn't quite as good as a 4x more expensive TV, but it's still very nice, and I have no complaints there! (also, I looked in the back, and it is indeed a Samsung LCD panel)Second, there are more inputs and outputs than most any other TV under $1,000. It features one output that most other TVs lack at this point, and that is analog RCA audio out, so older sterios and receivers can be hooked up without a digital to analog adapter.Third, the 60Hz, 8ms refresh rate is perfectly good for gaming. I'll be using this for gaming more than anything, and the movement is nice and smooth with both the Wii and the XBOX 360. It also works well with my HDMI capable Asus netbook. There is a little stuttering with 24fps movies, though (typical of 60Hz screens).Fourth, the sound quality from the speakers is decent after adjustment. It's pretty flat sounding out of the box, so I used the internal equalizer to add more clarity and depth by turning up the high and low frequencies. This does not affect the audio out, which is completely separate from the internal speakers. It's nothing great on its own, but the TV speakers combined with my sterio setup sounds excellent!Fifth and last, the TV looks great. The screen is anti-glare, but it doesn't sacrifice clarity. The simple frame and stand look very nice as well as clean. The glass stand is also very sturdy, and doesn't let the TV wobble (it is fixed though, and can't be rotated). Power is indicated by a tiny blue LED in the bottom left corner. The remote is basic, but functional. I couldn't ask for anymore from it at this price.Although it lacks some of the premium features of more expensive TVs, like internet or a 120Hz refresh rate, this  is without a doubt the BEST value in its class, and I'm glad I found it! Should it ever decide to die or go up in smoke, I'll give an updated review. But for now, I'm 100% happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great Find!
Reviews.Author: Excited Shopper
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for our spare bedroom.  For the price the picture and sound quality was much better than I expected! The TV had more options than most sets in this price range, such as the graphic equalizer to customize the sound and the surround sound. I have a Toshiba in my master bedroom and the TCL L40FHDF12TA has more input/output options than the Toshiba which was much more expensive. My husband hooked up his Xbox 360 to it and loves the picture.  He only plays the sport games such as basketball, football, baseball, etc. on it. We have a Comcast HD cable box hooked up to it as well which brings out the picture quality even more.  If you are looking for a TV in this budget range, and still want great quality, I would suggest purchasing the TCL L40FHDF12TA.

Reviews.Title: No "OFF" option for the Noise Reduction feature
Reviews.Author: Mark J. Kim
Reviews.Content: The problem with this TV is that it doesn't have an "OFF" option for a Noise Reduction feature. You have only 3 options which is Low, Middle, High. As many of you know that the noise reduction feature often reduce or degrade picture quality severely and it is not advised. I wish TCL would release a firmware update to give us the "OFF" option for the noise reduction feature. Another problem is that with the connection to the PC, there is a problem connecting in 1920x1080P resolution using HDMI or DVI to HDMI cable. Sometimes the TV can receive 1920x1080p signal from the computer and sometimes it doesn't. It's more like a hit or miss event. If you set it to 1920x1080i, then there is no problem but who would want to use it as half quality as its supposed to be used?HD contents displayed with this unit are excellent and sound is not bad either. But again, it could be better if I can set the Noise Reduction to OFF.

Reviews.Title: Great HD TV for Budget Price!
Reviews.Author: Deathbysushi
Reviews.Content: I am a student and I was in the market for a lower end 40" HDTV. I took a chance on this TV since it was so highly rated. I can see what all the hype is about! This TV is certainly the best budget TV I have ever seen.Pros:+ Probably the most important point: picture is very nice. The display is really made by Samsung and it has nice colors and a good backlight (some light bleed though, that never really bothered me). I don't have HD cable but the basic cable looks really good. Tried a movie in 720p (see below) and it looked fantastic.+ Speakers are decent.+ Easy setup, good menus for tweaking options.+ Lots of jacks including HDMI ports, very cool.+ Channels change pretty quick, a lot faster than other HDTV's I've seen.Cons:- VGA port (-1 star). I wanted to also use this TV as an external monitor for my laptop to watch movies on and I was unable to get 1920 x 1080 resolution (only outputted 720p). Another Amazon user said you could set some of the options up in Windows 7 to force 1080p but I was unsuccessful in doing so. Yet another user experienced the same issue, contacted TCL and they were told that it could not handle 1080p in VGA, only in HDMI. Pretty odd in my opinion. I haven't hooked up HDMI yet but I will attempt this and hopefully I can get the 1080p output from my laptop. Else, I will force the resolution via non-Microsoft software via VGA (easy to do but has the chance of ruining your TV, others have had success). Think carefully if you want to use this as a computer monitor if using VGA only.- Minor point but the USB port is only for pictures and mp3's. Your external drive has to be formatted to FAT to do so (older standard). Didn't bother with this but I suppose it's nice to share pictures on a USB stick.Overall, I couldn't be happier for the amount I paid for this. It is easily worth an extra $200. It is not perfect but know what you are buying. This is not a smartTV or a high end HDTV. However, if you are in the market for a big screen HDTV and don't want to pay $500+, this is most likely your best option!

Reviews.Title: good purchase
Reviews.Author: Linda Hart
Reviews.Content: My son told me about this TV.  He is tech smart & has advised my wife & I on many electronic purchases.  We found his advise too be right on for this TV.  It has a great picture & color.  The sound comes straight at you & is easy too adjust.  I would recommend this purchase to many friends.  The price when we bought was a bout a $125 or more below the name brands.  Excellent TV, Excellent price....great buy!!!  Did not take the extended warranty.

Reviews.Title: Excellent television.
Reviews.Author: Joel Grizzel
Reviews.Content: I bought a Costco extended warranty for this TV which extends the warranty to a total of 5 yrs for 30.00 more.  Free shipping as Amazon prime member as well.  By the way, unless you have digital cable I would not bother as you need it to get the big screen experience... analog is quite fuzzy.  Netflix will look great though.  I needed this TV like a hole in the head.  But it is a heck of deal.

Reviews.Title: Best bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: Victor Catano
Reviews.Content: You can't get a better TV of this size for this price. I was looking at 32" LCDs and found this one that was bigger and cheaper. it was an easy hook up and I love it.The only downside is that sometimes there is a slightly tinny sound quality.Otherwise, this is a great value.

Reviews.Title: BUY THIS!!
Reviews.Author: andre93K
Reviews.Content: If you're thinking about buying this TV, but you're still not sure, BUY IT! I was hesitant for a while, thinking to myself, "how good can a $320 TV be?" Turns out, it's a great TV, and for the lowest price you will ever see. My Xbox 360 looks just as clear as it does on more expensive Samsung / Sony TV's.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: RLee
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for use in a 2nd. home.  I didn't expect it to match my much more expensive Toshiba but it has turned out to be a really good value for the money.  Sure, it falls a little short of the much more expensive ones but it clearly provides a very acceptable picture (after my playing with the controls) and the sound is in fact better than my Toshiba.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great deal!
Reviews.Author: MBC
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV.  I absolutely love it.  Very clear and sharp picture.  People who visit ask me about the brand and where to buy it.  It was the deal of the year for me.  Definitely would buy another one, wish I had bought 2.  Definitely make the purchase, don't think about it.

Reviews.Title: Super deal for a great TV
Reviews.Author: Rosalie Kern
Reviews.Content: I was a bit skeptical purchasing this TV online, but a friend of mine purchased one and said it was great. I agree. The picture is good, at a distance and from any angle in the room. I have not had any trouble (as others reported) with it turning itself on or anything else. It's a fantastic TV for the price. I'm sure if put side by side next to another, more expensive and fancier TV you could tell a difference in picture quality, but it looks good to me, and I don't need any better for my tastes.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Price, Great Service!
Reviews.Author: sandlbrooks
Reviews.Content: Couldn't be happier!  We've had it almost a week now & no complaints! Never thought we'd be able to afford a Flat screen TV of this size!  We've waited many years to graduate from a huge 'boat anchor' of a TV to a flat screen. The picture is sharp with many ways to customize for your viewing pleasure. Shippment arrived as promised. Box was undamaged which is rare with any shipper! The way the TV was packed was impressive. It not only had thick protective styrofoam along with cardboard covered metal boarders to hold everything in place that the TV could not even wiggle inside the box!Thank You Amazon for great service & a great product!!TCL L40FHDF11TA 40-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LCD HDTV with 2-Year Warranty, Black

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a bargain price
Reviews.Author: izzy9985
Reviews.Content: I took a chance on this TV after having read the many reviews.  This was my very first HDTV purchase, and I was looking to find a high-quality HD set at a good price.After searching around, I saw many TV's in the 40-inch range were all at least $400-$500.  For $300, the most you could get was 32-inch sets.  That's why when I saw this for about $300, I jumped on it.I've had it for a couple weeks now, and here's what I like:- I know many reviewers were complaining about the sound, and I did find the sound somewhat "tinny" as others have described.  I changed some of the sound settings as other reviews suggested, and it sounds much better now.- The display itself looks great - crisp and clear.  I played around with some of the picture settings like brightness, etc. like the other reviewers suggested.  Note that your exact settings will vary based on the lighting conditions around your TV and your own personal preferences.- Cost.  Again, big screen for the price.- It came well-packaged and I had zero dead pixels.  Also, I did not have to do any type of firmware upgrade.- You can remove any inputs not in use from being displayed (so you won't need to cycle through a long list of inputs when all you have is 1 being used).Here's what I don't like:- You cannot label the inputs with your own label.  You can only use the Presets they have available (Blu-Ray, Game, etc.).  Since I hooked up both a PS3 and XBOX 360, I have one of them labeled as a Blu-Ray (the PS3) and the other labeled as Game.- Splash screen.  Every time you turn on the TV, a splash screen comes up with the name of the company, "The Creative Life."  Kind of annoying, but it only lasts a second or two, and I've become accustomed to it.Overall, the things I dislike are minimal in the grand scheme of things.  I'm very happy with my purchase, and would gladly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality, Great Price
Reviews.Author: KT
Reviews.Content: I use it for watching movies, playing video games, and watching sports. Its great for all three. Are there better screens out there? Yes. At this value? Probably not.

Reviews.Title: best value hdtv
Reviews.Author: grasshopper
Reviews.Content: Arrive quickly in goog condition, very easy to set up, HDMI and all that. Nice pictures, sound is ok. Would recommend to anyone who is look for similar size hdtv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Ochman
Reviews.Content: We were recently broken into, our electronics stolen. We decided not to replace, and if we did...go small as we expect that we will be hit again. We purchased the TV for a great price thinking that the loss would not cut as deep as some of the big investments that we lost.  We love this TV....really love it more than our 6o "Easy set up right out of the box, clear picture, Does Netflix proud. Don't think that it is junk because of the price. It really is a beautiful set.

Reviews.Title: TCL 40-Inch  tv
Reviews.Author: pj
Reviews.Content: Super great price, I bought two, 2 days before Christmas (259.00 each).They arrived in 24 hours and I hooked them up immediatley.  Both TVs run nearly 24-7 in my home and not even a minor glitch.Great picture, sound, compatible with cable remote and blue ray dvd player.High quality for a budget priced tv.Amazon is the best !

Reviews.Title: A great TV for a great price
Reviews.Author: M Wasek
Reviews.Content: I had my reservations about buying this TV but with some research I found more positive reviews than negative. This TV has covered if not exceeded my expectations. Yes the sound and picture needed to be adjusted. I have setup many new Televisions and I have to say I have not found one yet that had a perfect picture or sound right out of the box. The picture is amazing and the colors are vivid. This TV picked up all of the channels from my outside antenna without any problems. So my ratings: Over the air stations - 10/10, Xbox 360 (games and Netflix) - 10/10, Blu-ray - 10/10 and Price - 10/10.The picture quality on this TV was equal to or better than most of the other 40 inch televisions I had seen in many, many retail locations I visited looking for a TV before I purchased this one. I would recommend this TV to anyone and already have. I plan on buying another one in the near future. With an amazing price, great picture quality, Amazons return guaranty and 2yr warranty in my opinion this is an unbeatable deal.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Erik Erwin
Reviews.Content: Great deal, my son uses this for his bedroom and video games.  I have no complaints, yeah the base was a little hard to fit into place like other reviews stated, we just used some different bolts and it fit fine.  You can't beat this TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: So far So good !
Reviews.Author: sfchoosier
Reviews.Content: Just purchased this TV within last couple of weeks and I have to admit the biggest reason was the price !  Under $320 delivered to my front door !  Im not a electronics guru, but was very easy to hook up, very good instructions and unlike most TVs Ive noticed it has a glass base/stand and not plastic !  Anyhow, so far so good , within days of switching to DirectTV to get the HD experience.  Thus far this has been a great purchase !

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: RCB71
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the money. Had the tv for a week. Best tv for the price paid. Wish I could buy another tv for the same price a this one. I paid 259.00, on a one day deal price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Two Hours Late
Reviews.Content: I was sketchy at first when I saw a 40" TV on sale for such a great price. I had to check it out for myself. I figured what did I have to lose with a thirty day return policy and a two year warranty.  This TV did not disappoint.  opened it right up and plugged it in.  The picture was great and the quality was amazing. I highly recommend this TV. Will consider buying another for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: The other reviews say it all!
Reviews.Author: Timothy D. Hoogland "HouseOfBugs"
Reviews.Content: I have to say I bought this on a impulse purchase but it was definitely worth it. The other reviews are spot on. If you are on the fence about buying it just get it. Mine was in perfect condition and works great. I couldn't have asked for a better deal. This does have all Samsung internals so whats not to love?

Reviews.Title: TCL 40-Inch 1080p LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: dealshopper
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent TV for the price, what a deal. I purchased this for my daughter and after seeing how good the picture was as well as the number of hdmi inputs I bought it for myself. It is great for a bedroom tv or any smaller room in your house. When you turn the TV on it takes a long time till you see an actual picture displayed is the only complaint I have so far.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: hapehr1
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Tv because it had so many positive reviews I couldn't be happyer with it. Some of the reviews helped with setup and setting and were great it was up and running in 30mins. Wow the picture is great good sound and lots of inputs for games and Dvd.

Reviews.Title: Works great on my ps3
Reviews.Author: chonggo
Reviews.Content: Received mine within 2 days and I've very happy with this TV. I thought it is going to be dark but its actually really bright.

Reviews.Title: BEAUTIFUL FLAT SCREEN TV
Reviews.Author: Franklin J. Lopez "juarez"
Reviews.Content: I have not tried all the features and connections of this nice TV butso far it has done everything I expected.

Reviews.Title: Can't be happier
Reviews.Author: PEPE
Reviews.Content: Being that I bought this product, which was $200 less then it's nearest competitor, I'm amazed at the quality of this HDTV.  From the picture quality to the sound quality to the ease of navigation of its menus and inputs.  How is it that I've never heard of TLC before:-)

Reviews.Title: Love it.. Love it...
Reviews.Author: Andy "Andy R"
Reviews.Content: Was a bit apprehensive after reading some of the negative reviews..  But the specs and the price just sold it for me.. I ordered it and got it delivered in 2 days.. Amazon!!! - Awesome...Setting it up was a snap.. Hooked up my Roku and the antenna.. I was streaming in 1080p and the pictures were great.. Wish the color was more eye-popping.. But the video is great nevertheless..Some people had complained about the sound.. I bought this for my exercise room and even with the sound of the treadmill running, I still do not see any issues with the sound..Now it just has to continue working for a few years and I would be a very happy camper..I'd highly recommend it.. Giving it 5 stars.. Incredible value are 320..

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great PRICE
Reviews.Author: AMG02
Reviews.Content: I just recently bought this TV and was skeptical because it was such a great price and an older model was almost 200 more. I figured I would just go for it and would be able to return it easily if there were any problems. After receiving the TV I must say I was quite impressed. The picture quality is great (Sports picture setting) and the sound is better than my 32 inch sony bravia. I also have an xbox 360 and the picture is awesome on that as well.I've never written a review before but I would strongly encourage anyone who is on the brink of buying this TV to do so because you won't be disappointed.The only downside is that my universal remote does not work with the TV, but it still gets 5 stars in my book.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV good deal for the price
Reviews.Author: joefnblow "joefnblow1"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my Mother in Law and she loves it.  It was easy to set up and includes 2 RGB inputs which is nice since she still uses a VCR and old dvd player.  I used the RCA remote codes for AT&T; Uverse and it works with the Uverse remote.  So far so good.

Reviews.Title: I'm glad I got this baby!
Reviews.Author: Coffee Forever... "I LUV COFFEE"
Reviews.Content: WOW! Best TV for the money. I had my eye on one that cost 2-3 times the price but did not really want to spend the money. When I got this I was not expecting mush. Just hoped it worked. WOW! Not only does it work but works great and the image quality is great. Even viewing from the sides it looks great. My Sharp TV was no where as good and the remote did not work from the extreme side either but this one does,The only thing I miss is my other TV remote let me program in my favorite stations but so far I don't think this one does. But for the money I could buy 2 or 3 of these TV's and enjoy in many rooms... But I only needed one so bank the extra cash.It arrived in just one day via UPS in great shape and packed extra well.The glass base kind of worried me at first but went on in a snap and adds extra weight to base for added stability,If you want a nice 40" but don't want to spend $500, $750 or more this one will make you happy... And if it breaks where else can you get a 2 year warranty...

Reviews.Title: Loved it until....
Reviews.Author: amynaz
Reviews.Content: Update: January 10, 2012The new TV arrived and it works great. I have had it six days and have not had any issues. I will update if anything comes up. I updated it to 5 stars based on the new TV._________________________________________________________________________________________________Original Review:I have been reviewing TV's for years and finally decided on this one because of the wonderful reviews, size, and price. It arrived quickly and in great shape. Set-up was fairly simple, the longest part was attaching the stand. I had everything working and it had a clear, crisp picture and great sound. Later in the evening I turned the TV back on and channels started changing by themselves. I orginally thought it was scanning or I had hit a button and it was stuck. I checked everything, had to turn the TV off to get it tt stop. The next morning it did it again, so I checked on-line and for this model it was suggested to install the firmware update. Thanks to the previous reviews I found everything I needed and completed this process. The final step in the process was for the TV to "reboot." It shut off and was supposed to turn back on in 30 seconds. Not only did that not happen, I could not get it to turn on again. I tried many different things and nothing worked. I called TCL and they were not open on Saturday. Thanks to Amazon's wonderful return policy UPS is picking up the TV on Monday and I am going to try this again. I am taking another chance because I LOVED it until this happened. I am hoping that the next one does not change channels or turn on by itself as others have indicated, because I do not want to install the update again.

Reviews.Title: First time LCD owner
Reviews.Author: TXGarrett
Reviews.Content: My Sony Trinitron died right after Christmas.  I had been thinking about buying a new tv for Christmas because I knew the prices would be great.  I was pleasantly surprised to see that Amazon still had great prices for this tv even after Christmas.  I purchased this tv at 3:30pm cst on Thursday for $299 and it was sitting in my living room by 9:30am Saturday!  It was supposed to arrive on Friday, but there was a shipping hiccup which delayed it by one day. One phone call to Amazon and they refunded me the $3.99 for one day shipping PLUS made sure I received Saturday delivery to get my tv asap!  Thank you Amazon for correcting the problem fast.On to the TV:I made this purchase because of a previous review from another Amazon customer who showed that the LCD screen itself was made by Samsung!  I wanted a Samsung, but was going to go with a smaller size because of the prices.  My parents have a 42" Samsung LCD HDTV, My sister has a 42" Samsung LCD HDTV, and I love Samsung products as well.  The price for the product is fabulous AND it's true that the LCD screen is manufactured by Samsung.  I've got the same product number and Samsung stamp that the other customer was talking about!!!!  The picture quality is wonderful!  No dead pixels, fuzzy lines or any other things one could worry about.  Remember I'm coming from a perspective of a person who has never owned a LCD, Plasma, LED, or any kind of HDTV.  However, I've seen lots of them in the stores, restaurants, friend's houses, etc.  Therefore I feel that for the price this television blows the competition away.  It came with a 2 year warranty and since I bought it with my AMEX card that warranty will be extended by another year.  3 year warranty on a $300 LCD TV with awesome color and clarity.  The speakers on the set itself isn't wonderful, but it would suffice until better speakers could be purchased.  I've connected some BOSE speakers to it and I'm getting bose-dacious surround sound!Great Product for an Excellent Price.  You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: So Far Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Jessica L. Connelly "Stage Manager"
Reviews.Content: I got my TV yesterday. It was ordered Tuesday night late and arrived Thursday afternoon, Fantastic. I had it out of the box and set up and playing with the hour (with at trip to target for a HDMI cable.) I am not knowledgable about electronics, this was my first hd tv, I attached my Cable box, Roku and DVD play one wire each and done and it is simple simple simple to switch between. Pictured seemed a touch dark at first but with a few quick tweaks It looks great.  For such a great price I am over the moon happy.

Reviews.Title: Scored "awesome wife" points with this one!
Reviews.Author: Geo
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for my husband. He is trying to update his office and wanted a TV big and small enough to fit there and be hooked up to all his techy stuff (computer, laptop, xbox, cable, blu-ray, etc.). This TV is perfect. And since my husband is frugal and has been watching tv prices like a hawk, he was very pleased with the good price I got on this. I searched Walmart, Frys, Target, Best Buy, and countless other online sites to find something with the same specs for less money. It can't be found outside of Black Friday. The picture was great and the sound quality was good, too. Another reviewer said the sound wasn't very good, so I was worried, but when we watched a movie on it, I was pleasantly surprised that it sounded so good. It's a perfect TV for that extra room in the house. We also hooked up his laptop to it, and the clarity of the text and web browsing was better than our Toshiba 55" HDTV! He was really excited when he saw that, because that's been one of his complaints about finding the right TV for his office. I scored major "awesome wife" points on this one!

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly Surprised
Reviews.Author: MT
Reviews.Content: I got this TV at $300 on Amazon and after buying and returning a Coby 40" LED TV due to quality issues, I was pleasantly surprised by this TV.  I installed the firmware update immediately after pulling it out of the package, popped in a PS3 video game (Battlefield 3) and the TV looks very impressive.  I still have it on the factory supplied video settings, but plan on calibrating it tonight and hope for even better results.  The firmware update was very easy to do.  Quality looks great while watching "Rise of the Planet of the Apes".  I have a 50" Samsung Plasma and feel this TV is actually pretty close on picture quality at first glance.At this price, it's a remarkable deal.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: TheSC "TheSC"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this when they had it on the lightening deal for $260. I was hesitant due to some other reviews, but it turned out to be a great surprise.Pros:-Unbeatable price-Great picture quality-Vibrant color-Rich, deep blacks. Not gray and washed out like others-Great sounding on board speakers, nothing that will blow you away, but better than others-3 HDMI ports-VGA connection-Side connections for USB, HDMI, and composite connections-Very light weight-Stand is heavy, sturdy, solid glass-Samsung LCD panel-Runs very cool, doesn't heat the room up like my previous TV-Works great as a monitor-Very responsive and easy to use remote-Menu screens are very user friendly and easy to navigateCons:- The HDMI up-scaling. If you are connecting a computer via HDMI it will make the screen slightly too large and not display all the contents. Here is the fix:"If your using hdmi, your TV will scale funny if you have "hdmi overscan" turned on.You can turn this off by pressing the left or right arrows on the remote until it says "NO hdmi overscan" After doing that, you'll be able to see the full computer monitor image (1920x1080) and not with the zoomed scaling."Other:-The TV came packaged very well. The Styrofoam blocks surrounding it were very thick.-The speaker grille (silver) across the bottom is the only non black part, other than the logo, and stands out. Helps break up the all black though, so neither good nor bad.

Reviews.Title: No Code # to set remote
Reviews.Author: Connie P
Reviews.Content: I received the TV quickly, and was impressed with the clarity for the price. The only issue I have, when I called Direct TV to help program it to their remote, I was told they didn't have any codes for TCL brand and I would have to use the TV remote to adjust the volume...and only the volume. The customer service person for Direct didn't seem to know much or didn't have it on her cheat sheets. I will call back and try another CSR later and if that doesn't work, I will have to use two remotes.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv, and great price
Reviews.Author: Patricia Brouillette
Reviews.Content: For the size this is a great price, along with it being a great quality image. It is really easy to set up and light weight. I like the fact that the different inputs, you can label them to what you have hooked up to it in that specific input, so you don't have to remember.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price so far!
Reviews.Author: Praveen Mohan
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV inspite of so many negative reviews in the last week just because of Amazon 30 day return policy. The TV arrived in time and was well packed, it was very easy to setup and the picture quality is very good on HDMI Cable. I have not contacted the customer service yet, so no comments on that. I will update the status later again in few months.. but so far I don't see any reason why it should get less than 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: the greatest TV!!!!
Reviews.Author: Zhentao Song "zhentao song"
Reviews.Content: Using the standard shipping, it only took two days to get my TV. It is the greatest TV,  easy to set up, with great picture and sound.  Additionally, I really like its glass stand. Before I purchased this TV, I had seen some brands 40" HDTV in stores. I think this TV is the best choice for 40" HDTV with the price around $300.

Reviews.Title: One of the best 'bang for the buck value' products I've bought!
Reviews.Author: GuruGuys
Reviews.Content: I purchased three of these to give as gifts during Christmas 2011 and all three are working perfectly in their gift recipient's home. I am amazed at the quality of this display when you consider the price. The fact it has a two year warranty and the previous model was reviewed so well (over 1000 reviews and over 4 stars here at Amazon) was what lead me to buy it but after playing with the TV I am even more satisfied with my purchase. The picture, while nowhere near outstanding, far exceeds every other competitor in it's price range that I have tested. Keep in mind that videophiles need not apply here as you will get some light bleeding, it doesn't hold blacks well on bright scenes and contrast is low on bright scenes, and even after some fine tuning color accuracy is only average. That being said, and especially used for a secondary display in a bedroom, game room, bar, restaurant, etc you can't go wrong with the TCL.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: C.Leong
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV as a gift to my parents, and in the interest of Christmas had it one day shipped so it'd make it in time. I was afraid with all the negative DOA reviews that this might not have been as wise a choice as I'd thought, but on Christmas, after we had it all set up, it was awesome. Picture is great, the sound is better than I expected, and most of all it WORKED!! Best bang for my buck, and a very happy pair of parents!

Reviews.Title: Glad to have it..
Reviews.Author: dwright
Reviews.Content: I am glad to get this TV set deal. So far I am very satisfied with the product. Compared with other big brand, this one is much cost effective. The image quality is very good, looks even better than other TVs I have been using. I feel I am lucky since I saw some negative reviews on this product. I decided to try because some of the reasons I feel are related to the packaging and shipping. Overall, I think this is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: just in time....
Reviews.Author: Zildjian "Alpha Q"
Reviews.Content: nice color, picture quality. I just opened the box, and we're watching dolphin tale right now. I was kinda scared from what I've read in the reviews...but I think I got lucky, works fine for me, for now...i'll update my review after five months or so just like what was mentioned in the review. Maybe handling from the carrier is also a factor...

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Shart
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV at 9:30am on December 23rd and picked free super saver shipping.  The estimated delivery date was December 28th, this seemed reasonable.  Exactly 1 day later 9:30 am on December 24th this arrived on my doorstep.  The shipping warehouse must be down the street or something because I didn't expect it so fast.  I knew about the firmware bug so the first thing I did after I got the TV put together and plugged in was upgrade the firmware.  This took about 4 min's to do it from start to finish.  If you know where your USB port is and can find the firmware upgrade on their website this should be no problem.  Maybe they decided to drop the price to get rid of the ones that needed the upgrade?  I scanned my channels and the TV is up and running.  I wasnt too proud about the TCL logo on the front of the unit so I took a black sharpie and colored it in.  I let it dry and went over it again with a second coat.  My wife looked at it from about 2 feet away and claimed that she could even see where the loco used to be.  I'm loving it so far.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Big JIm
Reviews.Content: I just got the TCL 40 inch TV today. I hooked it up and the picture is great! The sound is better than I expected. I would recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this product.
Reviews.Author: Dean Daily
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this product! My TV stopped working two months after I purchased it through Amazon, and for 41 days now I have been writing/calling the manufacturer trying to get the TV repaired. The manufacturer rep (Terry, cs10@adelectronicsusa.com) at first said this problem was common and expected and they would send me replacement parts. I still haven't received the replacement parts after dozens of phone calls and emails. Last week I spoke to the supervisor (Elise) at the call center. She told me they don't ship replacement parts for this TV! Instead, she would ship me a return box. Three calls and another week later, they still can't find a box to ship to me! The TV doesn't work and the customer service is horrible. Buy any other TV and save yourself money and headaches!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy! Don't listen to the 1 and 2 star commenters
Reviews.Author: Garrett
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV after selling back books to Amazon and receiving $280 in Amazon credit.  I knew I wanted to buy a big TV, but did not want to pay $500 or $600.  I found this TV and was a little bit cautious due to the incredibly low price and relatively unheard of brand.After doing some research, I found that TCL is currently only being sold through Amazon.  Seeing how Amazon has the best customer service in the business, I assumed that they must have done their homework and checked in to TCL before carrying their product.As for the TV, it is perfect.  Upon opening the set, I had to disagree with all of the negative reviews I had read so far.  The remote control is not cheap feeling, the sound is comparable to any other set with stock speakers, and the picture is top notch.  I am fully satisfied with my product and would purchase another if I needed one.Another aspect I enjoyed was the included base.  Instead of a plastic base to stand the TV, this one is made of glass and is very good looking.  Not only is it aesthetically pleasing, but it really does a great job keeping the TV in place.  It is a sturdy mount and I do not have any concerns about the TV being knocked over.5 Stars for this TV, great buy.

Reviews.Title: 2 line showing on the screen after 9 months
Reviews.Author: Peng Xiao
Reviews.Content: Both the TV and amazon are good.2 things I want to mention,1. If you want to update the firmware, use a USB drive formated with FAT. This TV can't see NTFS.2. When use HDMI, press zoom button on the remote control until choose "No Overscan". This will give you the full screen.Update: one level line and one vertical line are showing on the screen after 9 months. Sent an email to TCL, but no reply.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: This a great TV for the price...to the average TV viewer it is perfect...if you are a gamer probably not for you...but I'd buy more if I had a place to put them!

Reviews.Title: Good buy, bad package
Reviews.Author: Sunshine State
Reviews.Content: I purchased this 40-inch TV and it was delivered within a few days.The delivery company left the TV outside on my front door step, luckily it was still there when I got home.The price was competitive at $319.99 (with tax) and shipping was free.The TV was pretty much plug and play and looks good.The only disappointment that I have was the packaging...the tape was broken, sterofoam was also broken inside of the box.When I went to lift the box, the bottom fell out.Thankfully, the TV was in perfect condition and overall I am very pleased.FYI...the TV just dropped to $299.99 which makes this an ever better buy.

Reviews.Title: Great product dirt cheap
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: I got this tv on a gold box special for $259 with free shipping with my prime membership. I wish I had bought 5 of these. The picture is awesome. The sound is excellent. The tv itself is sturdy, not cheap feeling. Even the remote is nice. I seriousely wish I had bought one for every room in my house for this price.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after 15 minutes!
Reviews.Author: V. Aslan "vzafer"
Reviews.Content: Okay so I was so happy to get this deal (goldbox deal) and today I finally opened the box and was super excited to fire it up. Shortly after I found out that the tv stand is made of glass (fancy yes, practical NO) and it is so unnecessarily HEAVY. Anyways, I didn't care about it at all. I checked the back panel and saw the samsung label and then I was even happier. Connected my cable...the picture was, OK, and on the good end (I am sorry but it wasn't like great, but again hey you pay only $260 so still was very happy). Shortly after I noticed one dead pixel which was very close to the righ bottom corner....I didn't care as it was almost impossible to notice....5 minutes later I noticed the light bleeding from the top two corners (it is kinda common with lcd's and it was not awful so decided not to worry about that one either).....the list of defects kept getting longer.I then hooked it up to my ps3, started playing AC revelations, colors were a little too vibrant but then again it was okay, then five minutes later all of a sudden a yellow vertical line appeared that splits the screen into two equal halves. While I was trying to figure out what it was, another line (this time green and horizontal) appeared...and as of the moment they are still there.....and every once in a while the screen becomes completely green???I really wanted to like this set and give 5 stars, I really wanted to be one of those lucky ones who buys an off-brand that produces great picture and costs so little, so that I can brag about it to my friends :),,BUT no...sorry..not happening, not to me at least.I am sure you all noticed how many DOA products TCL has shipped out with this particular model and I really dunno why...I really dont wanna go through this hassle again and seems like I am just gonna return it not replace it. I would rather pay couple of hundreds more for long term reliability...(personal preference especially after this experience)For those of you who got working condition tvs....congrats, you definitely nailed a good deal and I hope you won't ever need to deal with any of the problems I faced (within 15 minutes of use)....enjoy it!

Reviews.Title: I think I have found a bargain.
Reviews.Author: Randy E. Heick "tastebud"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a second tv and wanted at least a 32 inch.  I seen this 40 inch and did some research and it turned out that it looked like a good deal.  I received the tv in 2 days, that was amazing in itself.  Took in out of the box, put the stand on it and plugged it in.  The quick start guide that came with it showed me the rest. I was watching tv in less that 15 minutes with a great picture and the setup was toooo easy.  So far so good.  I have it hooked up to my dish network box with a hdmi cable and am very satisfied. I dont think you can find to many 40" 1080p LCD's with a two year warranty for just over 300 bucks.  I will update this if I run into any issues.I had to follow up about this TV. It has been 5 months and the picture is still awesome and working great.  One of the best purchases I have ever made.

Reviews.Title: Dead Pixels, No true 4:4:4 Chroma Subsampling
Reviews.Author: Seebert Online
Reviews.Content: Out of a batch of these TVs I personally know of that were tested for dead pixels (6), 4 of them came with dead pixels.  That is a 66% chance, pretty high.  These seem to be B-rated Samsung panels, you may get lucky and get one without dead pixels though.Also, the firmware does NOT support 4:4:4 Chroma, which means this TV does not display colors accurately, mainly for text.  See:[...] if you need more information on that.Lastly, support seems literally to be ONE GUY, Terrance / aka Terry.  The company is adelectronicsusa.com.  They rank very LOW on the BBB ranking, my experience wasn't terrible but wasn't great by any means.

Reviews.Title: I'm Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Guy Padgett
Reviews.Content: Excellent value, everything I expected and more.Picture quality is great, setup and use simple and effective.  May not have all the "bells and whistles" but has all I need/want and more.While I was reluctant to go with a brand that I am not familiar with, I now have no reservation recommending it to others.

Reviews.Title: Great TV (for price)
Reviews.Author: dmw_tx
Reviews.Content: I like this TV.  It's good.  However you DO kinda of get what you pay for.  Just remember that.  Blacks are not too great on this TV (even for a Cheap LCD). I have bought 3 of these TVs so I can't say I hate them...just know that I am not willing to spend 600+ for a 40 inch 1080p screen quite yet. I am saving for Pioneer Elite Plasma. I go big or don't go at all really.  The problem is white bleed from the corners (upper left and upper right).  Flip inputs and go to a black screen and boom....you got some major white bleed through from the LCD panel.  This is a NON-REFUNDABLE issue though.  I didn't even ask TCL but if things hold true from other TV's makers...it's a part of the process of making LCD panels and sometimes...you can get lucky and get one without much bleed through.With that said...my first one was the worst.  It's kinda of annoying bleed through too.  Sometimes it can stretch up to 4 to 5 inches in...depending on the temp of the LCD panel.  I find myself just full screening Low Def content just to stop my fixation on the flaw.  My other 2 that I ordered....pretty good.  One has a little spot on the upper left...and that's it.  Compared to my first...(that had it both up left and right)...it's acceptable and I don't notice it while watching content that didn't fill the area.  3rd one...even better.  Nothing. Nadda. No bleed to speak off.The other 2 are going back in the boxes as gifts (I am keeping the bad one...just in case this issue progresses and I need to RMA).I am only giving it "4 stars".  Just because of the luck of draw on the quality control issue.  Turning my TV on...before shipment should have resulted in being tossed IMHO...no matter what price.  It's quite annoying. Other 2 are good....so I took just one star off.I DON'T want to discourage ANYONE from buying a good 40inch though.  It's unbeatable price and picture is great for 320.00.  I can't say for CERTAIN that my issue is normal.  This company prob ships 100,000+ of these TVs in 3 months....so you would certainly need  more reviews that confirm my issues as a problem with these TVs.  Buy AWAY...you are not going to beat this price and find a Samsung Panel any where near this price.Picture Quality : 7.5 (out of 10)Sound Quality: 7.0 (out of 10)Price: 10 (out of 10)Feature Set at price range: 9.0 (out of 10)Quality: Unknown to me....See other reviews to make up your own mind.

Reviews.Title: Great value.
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: This TV looks great in my living room, the picture quality is good, and watching the NFL playoffs on it was fine. I have no desire to spend the money it costs to get a top of the line unit with 120Hz or higher refresh rate, and I don't need 55 inches, so this TV works great for me. Much better than the one it replaces, so I am perfectly happy with it.The only issue is that I paid $3.99 for prime overnight shipping so it would be here on saturday, but fed ex told me it was on a plane that had "mechanical issues", and it didn't get to the local shipping facility in time to get put on the truck. So I ended up having to drive to the local fed ex and pick it up myself in order to get it on saturday. One more reason no one likes you, fed ex.

Reviews.Title: Great deal can't complain
Reviews.Author: Fox23
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for myself at the beginning of January for just $300 which can't be beat anywhere. Shipping took 1 day and I ordered after 3 pm, talk about fast. I read many reviews before I trusted in the brand and I'm glad I chose to  do so. The picture is great sound is also. I read of complaints about light showing in the corners during dark scenes and ill say that you do notice it only when the entire screen is black. This I don't feel is a big deal I still give a 5 star. I do believe though that the tv's originally artting of the brigtness is high so if you turn that down its fine. Love it overall, has the quality of a Samsung. So my final thought is... If you find this tv on sale DON'T HESITATE buy it!! Don't miss out.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable Bargain on Amazon
Reviews.Author: EJC
Reviews.Content: I got lucky Thursday 12/23. I woke up and checked Amazon for the deal of the day and found this 40" TCL for $259.99. With Amazon points, $118 out of pocket. It doesn't get better than this.The TV set up quickly. Menus easy to navigate. Great picture and works with the Harmony remote (need to do some tweeking on this one today). Combined with a Samsung Wireless Blu-Ray  with SmartHub who needs a smart TV.I got it to replace an 8yr old Sony 42" Grand Wega that did not have HDMI inputs. The Sony still worked great but at this price I did not have to listen to the wife complain about the switch. And it has a much smaller footprint than the Sony. She did notice this smaller footprint in the living room.BTW, the shipping was free and I was stunned when it was here the next day 12/24. This was above and beyond for an order that was  not Amazon Prime*****************Just to update. The TV has been set up for a week and all is well. Still love the Hi-Def picture, color is great.I was able to get the Harmony Remote working better. The issue appears to be that their codes don't have this model listed yet and I had to use the codes for the 11TA, which has one less input. I renamed one input on the Harmony menu to match the 2 Component color inputs on the 12TA, this may not have been necessary since it appears that the Harmony steps through the inputs but it made it easier to follow the progress.  And I deleted one input on the TV so the Harmony would see the same number of inputs as it had in it's code list. The Harmony now steps through the inputs and the TV has integrated nicely into the AV surround sound system.Getting it all working together took an afternoon - AV Receiver, Blu-Ray wireless connected player, WII,Harmony remote,VCR (yeah I know real old school), Netflix, and Cable.Hook time was NOT THE FAULT OF THE TV, I think it simply shows that the days of simply plugging in a TV are long gone as systems become more complex.******************Someone else reported a problm with a Dark Picture. I had the same problem at first. It can be corrected through the menus. You need to change the picture setting to not adjust for room light. A quick fix.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: K'Sonnae Simmons
Reviews.Content: bought it two years ago and it still works great. for the price it's ok...the pixels are not AS great as in the latest and greatest when spending thousands on a tv but for the price I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Samsung guts!!!!
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: I have owned this t.v. for three years. It has preformed flawlessly and I don't think i'll ever need another t.v. i use this for regular cable and have it set up with a desktop. It works great in both capacities. Buy now!!! Samsung guts!!!

Reviews.Title: 2 and done
Reviews.Author: Kayse Cooley
Reviews.Content: I purchased a 43" TCL (not this model) from Amazon only to find the TV blinking out COMPLETELY exactly 2 months after the 2 year warranty period ended.  Nice timing.  Again, this review does not relate to this particular model (I picked the closest model description for my review) but the warning remains: "Caveat Emptor" on purchasing any TCL brand - hope your low-cost gamble pays off better than mine :(

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Visel "Mavrick"
Reviews.Content: Very nice for just a TV. It would have been nice if one could hook up a USB device and have it play the different video formats. A older model that is installed will do this. Don't understand why the change. But for viewing I would recommend this brand for everything else contained.

Reviews.Title: Very good television set
Reviews.Author: G. Buxton "gil"
Reviews.Content: I gave this five stars because it was just what we were looking for.  We found it to be very affordable to use in our vacation home.  We found it to be just as good as another we have that cost twice as much

Reviews.Title: Love the Picture! Great TV
Reviews.Author: Judy B.
Reviews.Content: The clarity of the picture, the low cost and size of the TV is great! I highly recommend it to buy.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the savings
Reviews.Author: smart1
Reviews.Content: Shortly after the 2 year warranty was up the picture developed the dreaded vertical lines on the screen. Don't try to save a few bucks and get short changed. Support for TCL is also very poor. Check out their website in English and you'll see most of it doesn't even work properly. Pay a few more bucks and buy a brand name you can count on. This is not one of them.

Reviews.Title: tv was great at first
Reviews.Author: Corey hudgins
Reviews.Content: can not use hdmi ports i originally thought this was problem with m x box 360 come to find out this is a common problem with the tcl tv so i purchased a new xbox and countless hdmi cords for nothing..the download to fix this is free but unfortunately it does not work on my tv...like mom said you get what you pay for !!

Reviews.Title: Best LCD for the Price. Built to last
Reviews.Author: mike r
Reviews.Content: i heard a lot about off brands, however this one has been working 3 years strong with no issues, nice sound quality and great definition on the LCD screen, its very bright and has high contrast. HDMI is a Plus. TCl has a winner with this one, maybe thats why i purchased 2 units, at $289.99 it was a steal. inc shipping.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: CLARENCE L COULLARD
Reviews.Content: I got this on a one day deal and that was over two years ago. The only TV available with 2 yr. warrantee. I wish it was more readily found. Good sound quality Excellent picture quality. I love it more than my Panasonic at double the price.

Reviews.Title: Terrible customer service
Reviews.Author: Chunfu Xu
Reviews.Content: Several lines appeared on the screen after 1 year. Returned for repair. The customer said the TV was not  repairable. Need to replace it. But they don't have TV available to ship to me. How ironic is that! Such a big TV company does not have TV to ship to customer. Now it has been three months. We still have not got our replacement TV. They have promised to ship on to us two weeks ago. But now I have lost contact with them again...So disappointed with their customer service!!!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!
Reviews.Author: Haylee
Reviews.Content: I wish i could give this 0 stars. My tv started acting up with vertical line problems. I called and spoke with Erwin at tcl customer service. He said I was in my warranty and could return my tv to be fixed and would send me a box with label. Weeks later, no box or label. I call him and he said they did not send a box because per our discussion I had a box and they would just send the label.....(They didn't even sent that)  So, a week later i get my box and label, send out the tv. I am told I would receive a new unit in a week after they receive it.One month later, No television. I emailed Erwin from tcl back and fourth the entire time. I was promised that he would "Look into it" but after awhile he quit emailing me back. Oh yea, calling wont help, they only have 2 people working there!!! I get erwin or another lady everytime. Out of the handful of times i have called them i have not reached anyone else. The lady always hangs up on me, so i have to keep calling back until erwin answers, and he does not help me at all.Got a call from someone in their "repair shop" finally. So she says to me "Well, its been very slow since the start of the new year, we havent recieved enough tv's to refurbish, but dont worry, we havent forgot about you, and when we get a tv to refurbish we will send one out.One month later, No television. Jolene was supposed to have an updated LED model sent to me this past monday or tuesday. Nothing. I call in, she says they dont have any tv's and will call me when they do. So 2 and a half months no television. Non existent customer service, (besides erwin and another lady) and asking for a manager wont help. According to erwin there are none there..... I asked to have a supervisor at the repair shop call me or someone who was not jolene (who i spoke with previously), 48 hours later the same person calls.... I bet if i asked any one of them to ship me out a new tv with overnight that wouldnt be a problem though.Bottom line: AVOID TCL. I have decided to take legal action against them. Please spend the extra money and buy a television from a Reputable vendor with better customer service. AMAZON, look into these guys! They are not honoring their 2 year warrenty properly and i am not the first person to have problems with them!!

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: JAMES SELBY
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this unit. great picture for a lower priced tv. I would buy this product again in the future.

Reviews.Title: tv bargain
Reviews.Author: Robert Larocca "book reader"
Reviews.Content: great picture, good size, cable it to anything. you won't find a better tv for the price I don't think. I'm on my second now because I had to see the first when times got tough. works just as good as the day I bought it over a year and half ago.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: polarbear
Reviews.Content: nice tv.  has ALL the connections on it.  several of each ,,,  sound thru tv  is poor like most all tvs.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: T. HALASNIK
Reviews.Content: I bought this 2 years ago for my bedroom. It was a cheaper TV but I got to tell you it works great. Picture and sound are very good.

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture
Reviews.Author: pierzyna
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier with this TV.  It is the perfect size for my one bedroom apartment.  And the picture is so clear and beautiful.  I recommend it to everyone I talk to.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: John Grundy
Reviews.Content: Was a good buy - I thought!  Didn't last a yr.  After contacting TLC, sending a pic of screen, being told they could see what was wrong, part had been ordered & given contact info for when I rec'd the part.  I get an email asking for another pic of screen.  TCL then states the set had been dropped & was not warrantied.  IT WAS NOT DROPPED!  Thankfully I didn't spend anymore $ for this purchase.

Reviews.Title: TCL Television Set
Reviews.Author: Anilao diver
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TCL set to upgrade to digital.  It is connected via cable, and receives just fine.  It also interacts with the DVD disc player with no problems.  It is used several hours each day.  Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: tv not working
Reviews.Author: abdulrasool ghulamhussain
Reviews.Content: I open tv 2 days ago and not working power did not turn on I bought tv feb 2012 and upon now but tv not working

Reviews.Title: Great TV, but I'm a dummy.
Reviews.Author: Jordanna
Reviews.Content: Ah, tax returns, what a beautiful time of the year.I bought this TV with my new-found wealth and immediately noticed a horizontal line of pixels about halfway up the screen that just don't work. It's the thinnest line and doesn't hinder my ability to watch and enjoy games, movies, and shows, but it's there.The plan was to wait and see if it would go away by itself, but by the time I accepted it wasn't going to, I didn't want to go through the trouble of getting a replacement. And now the warranty is expired.But it's okay, my TV is still awesome.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Josh Mullaney
Reviews.Content: At the time I purchased this tv it was on sale, I had gotten some money selling books back, and was upgrading from a 20 inch tv.Worked great right out of the box, very sturdy stand which was great.  HAvent had any problems at all in the year I have had the tv

Reviews.Title: Tcl tv
Reviews.Author: Robert DiPrimio
Reviews.Content: For a 60 hz tv delivers a great picture even on non hd channels great choice would by again I recommend it to everyone I know

Reviews.Title: Good Deal Back Then
Reviews.Author: qgoof
Reviews.Content: It has been working like a charm for the past two years.  Hopefully, I didn't jinx myself.:) Good deal when I got it.

Reviews.Title: Nice! esp for the Money
Reviews.Author: Judy Rambo Little
Reviews.Content: Nice TV for the money. I have had it almost two years now. Easy to use nice picture decent size!

Reviews.Title: Superb television for the money!
Reviews.Author: Wayofthespoon
Reviews.Content: This has been an absolutely fantastic television!  Although it is only 60 Hz, I have never had any kind of screen lag, or horizontal delay in the picture with either cable, DVD, or video games.  And the price is fantastic!  I've had this TV for about 1.5 years now, and it's still going strong.  I like that this unit comes with 3 separate HDMI ports instead of the more common 2 ports.  I can easily connect my Roku box, Xbox, and Blu-Ray player to it.  The only issue (feature?) I've noticed with this television is that it gets warm very quickly, especially in small rooms.  But that's okay, because it doubles as a heater during the cold winter months.  You can adjust the output on the television as far energy consumption goes, however.  I tend to keep mine high, which would probably explain the extra heat.  But all in all, this is a superb television which is very well built.  I would definitely, and have, recommend this tv to others.

Reviews.Title: Owner for almost 2 years
Reviews.Author: Melissa Cason "texas_sunrise_sparkles"
Reviews.Content: My set is 2 yrs. old in Jan. 14.  I have had 0 problems/issues. Screen is clear & sound works for me. I would buy this TV again without hesitation. I take a good while to review so that I can give a fair one.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and a Great Price!!!
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: Pulled it out, plugged it in, and it fired right up! Easy hook up and a quality TV! My kids have been using it for gaming and I use it to watch Netflix and TV. Great picture and haven't had problem one and has been in use for nearly 2 years now!

Reviews.Title: Bad Unit
Reviews.Author: Deslie Romany
Reviews.Content: After the first year this television went bad. Colored lines are all over my screen. I can't watch anything on the TV now. Tried contacting the company and the admitted it is a manufacter issue. They said the TV is beyond repair. So I requested a new TV sent to me. That never happened. The customer support at this company is the worst. I will never buy another TCL. Worst experience ever.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for your money especially for younger adults on a budget
Reviews.Author: Phil Wagner
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV (purchased during cyber monday),  Great sound, great picture, Many HDMI ports for all your game consoles and DVD or BLURAY players

Reviews.Title: TCL Customer Service is HORRIBLE/NON EXISTENT.
Reviews.Author: Nicole Courtney
Reviews.Content: I wish I could give this ZERO stars.About a month ago I noticed a black line going down the left side of my screen. Then two black lines. Now THREE black lines. On Sept. 18, 2013 I called TCL and was asked to send photos of my TV showing the black lines as well as a copy of my Amazon purchase receipt from the December 2011 purchase. I sent them via email on the 18th. Kayann said she didn't get them so I sent them again on the 19th. She then provided me with an incident number and told me I would have a box and prepaid shipping label at my house within 5 days. Well, 12 days later and I still didn't have a box or shipping label. The box showed up on my doorstep after 16 days, WITH NO RETURN PREPAID SHIPPING LABEL. I called this past Monday and told them I did not get the prepaid shipping label. The woman I spoke to said she would "expedite it" and that I should expect an email with the prepaid shipping label attached. I called again Wednesday because I STILL have not received the shipping label. I also EMAILED Wednesday and have not heard anything back from anyone.TCL, WHY DO YOU OFFER A TWO YEAR WARRANTY WHEN YOU REFUSE TO HONOR IT? Beware the cheap TV. You get the cheap service to go along with it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: Andrew G.
Reviews.Content: For a college student straight out of Basic Training, this TV was amazing! Did the trick for my gaming experience and it wasn't too exspencive. Plus it came here pretty quickly and in great condition! I am happy with my purchase and it is still going strong almost 2 years later!

Reviews.Title: Love the Brilliance of the Picture!
Reviews.Author: Lyle Hamilton
Reviews.Content: Used it two years now, which means the warranty is expiring, and we all know what that means.  Still, it has been great as a family room monitor for watching DVDs, Netflix, Pay Per View and normal cable programming.  Clear, bright and brilliant pictures, with plenty of opportunities built in to alter, modify and tweak the visual and audio settings.  It has done a much better job than its predecessor, which had to be returned for service midway through its first year, at our expense, of course.  Batteries run out fairly soon on the remote, and then the controls get harder to respond.  All in all, I'd buy one again at that price.

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfactory RMA
Reviews.Author: Jeff M Chatham
Reviews.Content: I bought this television from the Goldbox sale. I rma'd this TV, it took around 3 months before it was repaired. It has been having intermittent problems since this repair(screen doesn't work sometimes). I'm about to start the RMA process again, but I don't know if it's really worth the hassle.

Reviews.Title: Tv broke within a year and replaced with a refurbished tv
Reviews.Author: Jane
Reviews.Content: And the warranty only goes through the original TVs date of purchase. None of this was revealed by tcl or amazon. Not happy with the transaction.

Reviews.Title: T.V. is great!!!!
Reviews.Author: Carrie Walker-Hill
Reviews.Content: I give it a five star because the quality of this t.v. is great!!!! The pitcure is awesome! Love it! The price was great!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Viet Tran
Reviews.Content: I have owned this TV for over 1 year now. I watch netflix and play xbox 360 on it and it has performed very well with no issues. Price was also just right. I'm sure TV freaks will find something to complain about but for the average user: excellent product.

Reviews.Title: One of the best purchases I've ever made
Reviews.Author: CB
Reviews.Content: Buying a TV is a big purchase for most folks. Yes, TV's are getting cheaper, but they are not cheap. We all want a great picture at a great price. TCL gives that to you in spades. Searching and finding a TV online is a tough decision for most people, but reading the reviews online will give you confidence that you're venturing in good waters. Side not, the first TV that was sent to me didn't work. As soon as I called customer service (amazon, I believe), they were extremely helpful and sent us a new one (that works great) in no time at all. Other than "smart tv" features, this TCL has it all.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Melissa Brandsmeier
Reviews.Content: I was very scared on buying this product sense the TCL was not very well known. It works amazing. I have no trouble with it. Great price too.

Reviews.Title: Works for a while, but quits after 3 years
Reviews.Author: D. Phillips "rescue rider"
Reviews.Content: A friend bought this TV for me 2 1/2 years ago or so, It was manufactured in Sept 2010. It was reconditioned and arrived without a remote. The Direct TV remote didn't work for it. We called customer service and they said the codes weren't available. The did tell us how to change modes withe the buttons on the side so we could use the tv. The picture has worked generally well and still works. The buttons are wearing out and this morning the volume quit. Later I will try to plug speakers in, since the volume has never been great, but I will never buy a product of this brand again. For the money, stick with LG or Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV
Reviews.Author: J. Huemoller
Reviews.Content: This has been a great TV.  I really like how simple it works yet delivers an outstanding picture quality.  It was a great value as well.  Buy this if on sale.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Timothy S. Smith
Reviews.Content: This gets one star less than perfect because it was not mentioned in the product description that, for some reason, the only option for the resolution when connecting to a PC is 1280x720 (even though, for instance, Blu-rays play at 1920x1080 fine).

Reviews.Title: One of the Best TV's I have seen or used.
Reviews.Author: George M. Wilburn
Reviews.Content: Stacks up favorably if not better than any brands used in the past.  These brands include Admiral, Hitachi, Panasonic, Mitsubishi, Magnavox and others.

Reviews.Title: does not last
Reviews.Author: Cheryle Acuna
Reviews.Content: I bought myself one in dec. of 2011 and jan 2012 for my son and as of may 2013 the one for my son has quit working and mine has several black lines in it when it starts up.......I will not buy tcl products again....it is a waste of money...

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: NikBoston
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product as a gift to myself at a very low price, I've been very pleased with it!

Reviews.Title: TCL TV IS AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: What a nice set!!!  I liked it so much I put it in my bedroom.  It's a real treat.  I heard it's actually made by Samsung (from a review I read by a techie guy who gave it a good looking over).  Well, whoever manufactured this set did a nice job.  It's a wonderful TV.

Reviews.Title: One died the other is starting too
Reviews.Author: MyOpinion
Reviews.Content: I'm trying to work with the company to get this replaced.  It died.  The other one we have doesn't handle yellows well and if anything yellow is on the screen there will be yellow streaks the rest of the night, sometimes blue too but always yellow.The one that died has sound but the picture stays white/gray haunted looking.  You can see the TCL logo in grey(you always have to wait a good long time for the TV's to turn on while it is flashing you the logo) and then it is gone and we have sound but no pictures.It is within the two year window so I am hoping they will be replaced, for the money they were decent tv's that we were happy with, if only they had lasted.  But it looks like both will be not working in the next few weeks with one already completely dead.

Reviews.Title: Best Buy for the money...
Reviews.Author: flyjar
Reviews.Content: Have had the TV now for over a year and Love it.  In my book, best buy for the money.  Easy to assemble and operate.  The picture and color quality is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: good for the money
Reviews.Author: A. J. Moffa
Reviews.Content: good tv for the money. Great picture after some minor adjustments. The black is a little off during certain scenes, however, its not too noticeable. I am satisfied with purchase. Great size for a bedroom. Price is good

Reviews.Title: still have this tv and is working great
Reviews.Author: jared ford
Reviews.Content: Great price amazing tv ive had this thing for a few years now. I use it for my main media center and have taken to several lan parties. I'm blown away.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: vihar
Reviews.Content: Now that I had this product for more than a year, I never had any issues with this TV.Pros: Amazing picture claritygreat soundDesignCons: none till now.I still love my TV

Reviews.Title: It looked good, but now 1 year later....sound is going out!
Reviews.Author: ErinE
Reviews.Content: I've had this for only just over a year and now the sound is going out. I have to turn it up almost all the way to hear it and it has a constant high pitched noise too.I would suggest spending a little extra to get a good brand. Very disappointed and I can't afford a new one....

Reviews.Title: broke down in 3 months. TCL, worst customer service ever, does not honor warranty.
Reviews.Author: Yue Wang "guestseven"
Reviews.Content: The TV worked for 3 months perfectly and then it turned to a 40 inch white wall.The worst part is yet to come,  when I started to call the customer service.  You have to call 2 different centers to describe your problems. And they asked me to send purchase proof and pictures of the broken TV. I emailed them what were required and waited them to call. Nothing happened. After a long time of waiting, I called them again, after rounds of calling, they finally issued me an incident number. Then I had to describe the problem to another set of people . They were like, "well, we know what caused the problem and we are going to send you a part to replace." When finally I thought I made some progress with TCL, what happened next was surprise surprise: NOTHING again!! I had to call them a few more times to make sure they sent out the part.Then I called more times to set up an appointment for someone to actually come and replace the part. As usually, multiple phone calls.When a guy showed up to replace the part, I was like "just get this done". after the new part was replaced, my TV got back to normal again, for like FIVE minutes. Then it went all white.Then all customer service again.... A woman said we will escalate your request to the main office. I said I wished to talk to them directly can you pass me through? She said "sorry madam, even us, we contact with them only through email."What kind of company is this???!!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Joseph R Juvenal
Reviews.Content: With my income tax return I only had limited funds to get several things, one was a large TV for our bedroom. I would recommend this television for your living room! Clear picture and great sound. I am not an audiophile nor a person who needs the best of everything, I simply want good value for my money, good quality, things that last and work as advertised. I can lay in bed and see vivid colors and hear clear voices and music, etc. I mounted it on my wall by myself, it did not weigh a ton. It grabbed the cable channels right away and I have now had it two months. Buy this TV.

Reviews.Title: Warranty Service?
Reviews.Author: Mr. Bean "plain old guy"
Reviews.Content: Purchased in January 2012. I ran a dedicated coax line to the antenna input, wired a duplex outlet for power to where this nice big TV was installed... after several months the coax connection went bad...to send in for service would be difficult because the box was now disposed of, so it was removed from it's hanging bracket, brought to a local TV shop, who told me it needed a 'new board' for this connection, that "could be expensive"...so I purchased a 50 foot RCA cable, thinking it might work with that input used. It did, but then I learned Dish Networks' HD DVR (VIP 722K) does not provide enough outputs, those available were used for other devices.With a call in to TCL customer service then made to figure out what to do with a 2 year warranty coverage... they offered...eventually...wanted an 'original receipt'...to send a replacement board.But the board was 'not in stock', so "let us know when you receive it, we'll backorder for you...then we'll call a tech to come to your home to replace it for you". Great, I should have asked for that in the beginning, but didn't realize the SIZE of my TV was what was used to determine if a 'tech would come' to our home. That was my fault, not wanting to buy a replacement box & ship at very high cost, I thought it best to check out the cost of repairing a TV only several months old versus the headache, cost and time of the alternative.Well, 'customer service' told me they'd have a tech call me after I called to notify them the 'board' was finally received (3 weeks later)....long wait...no call. Emailed customer service....ignored.... called again, was moved up to 'urgent' status, I "should receive a call in 24-28 hours".... it's now a week later....The TV has been not working several months now, notified TCL over a month ago...still waiting...

Reviews.Title: Awesome, worth it purchase
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've owned this item now since 2011 and haven't looked back. I bought it on sale and was debating between it and a more expensive magnavox. We tried both of them in our home and ended up keeping the TCL. Never had an issue, better picture quality than the Magnavox we had looked at, and cheaper. It also has more HD ports than the Magnavox. One thing though, don't listen to their "picture types" when setting up your pictures. The gaming picture was horrid.

Reviews.Title: beware of warranty and tv quality
Reviews.Author: MIC
Reviews.Content: First note I did not purchase from Amazon but I felt I should warn others who might consider buying a TCL tv from any where. My 4o" tv is 14 months old now and dead !!! It died at just over 12 months. First of all the tv would turn on all by it self at random times. Which was not a  huge ordeal but then it started with one dead pixel and now has aprox 9 that is befor it died completely. It will not turn on at all now. I made a warranty claim 2/20/13 mind you today is 3/26/13 I was first told they would be having a technician come out to my home to repair it.Ok thats fine. 12 days later still no technician, Call again now told they were never sending out a technician they were shipping me a power board and when I receive it in 10 days to call they would send a technician to install it. I asked how they know what parts are needed since no tech has came out and they reply new power board will fix all  the problems. Ok fine we are at 35 days later still no part no technician and no TV TO WATCH ! I call again this time Im told the first story about a tech coming out to fix it. I explain how I have been told two different storys already and still have no working tv. I get put on hold and then hung up on. I call back get another person who says oh sorry The dept that deals with the parts is closed for lunch. She will call me back in an hour and  1/2.
