I am sure that will happen just like Im sure some one was coming to fix my TV 35 days ago. I will call again and get a new set of exscuses as to why it has not been taken care.  Because that is a different dept that they will have to check with and get back to me. I am not a tv tech but I dont think a new power board is going to fix dead pixels in the screen. It will how ever at least make it power on.Which is more then I have now. It might say 2 yr warranty but good luck getting them to actually fix your tv. All I have got is a bunch of run around.

Reviews.Title: Great Cheap 40 inch
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: I bought this cheap TV for my bedroom and at $200 this TV is a steal.  Its got all the basic things that you need and works for exactly what I need it for.  It doesn't have the picture of a samsung or a sony and because its only 60hz  doesn't handle motion that well.  Video games are probably better served with a TV thats 120hz.  For a basic HD Bedroom tv this will definitely work especially at its low price.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: J. Fissel "maureen"
Reviews.Content: So far the TCL HDTV has performed well, the picture and sound quality are very good, I would recommend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: KenWood
Reviews.Content: Had the TV for about 2 weeks now. Sadly had to replace a 27" tube RCA from 1999 in the master bedroom. Great picture, good sound. I'm happy with the purchase considering I spent 10 times the amount for a 46" Sony LCD in 2006 for basically the same quality. Just hoping it lasts as long as the Sony.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this TV. It works great had it for almost 2 years now and no issues what so ever. Im getting another one this Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Perfect choice.
Reviews.Author: melanie4319
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for our RV in Florida.  Great picture, great sound, and we hung it on the wall to save space.  It's great!

Reviews.Title: Works great for the price
Reviews.Author: A/V in SD
Reviews.Content: As with many considering this TV i was skeptical because i didn't know anything about TCL.  I took the plunge and have been happy i did ever since.  Note this is a Bedroom tv and gets fairly light duty compared to my game room and living room TV's but it works like champ.  There aren't enough HDMI plugs which sucks but they have hubs for that.  The remote isn't the best but this is worth its price for sure!

Reviews.Title: Failed after a few months
Reviews.Author: Thomas Hunter
Reviews.Content: This TV stopped working about 5 months after I bought it new through Amazon. It has a 2 year manufacturer warrenty but I had trouble with TCL's return group who were not at all helpful and when I asked Amazon to assist me they basically told me "tough luck, we only cover1-3 months" or something to that effect.I will be escalating this issue within Amazon for having such a poor attitude in helping it's customers who buy inferior products advertized and sold through their website and I will once again go after TCL since they pretend to have a two year warrenty...if you can find them and their scam of sending more emails to the other part of the company.  However, I will try again to find someone who gives a damn about customer satisfaction.Do yourself a favour and buy your next TV from a real store where you can bring it back.  Oh, and thanks again amazon for your excellentent customer service skills! Hmm Hmm!!

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: ITALIANMAMA
Reviews.Content: This tv is well worth the money and just as great a picture as the more expensive tv's I have in my hiome

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: L. Phillips
Reviews.Content: We bought one of these in 2 years ago and loved it so much that we bought a second one last year. They both have great picture quality and the sound is not tinny. Lots of hookups for games and DVD/DVR players and lots of menu options to really tweak settings. My kids are playing Wii on it right this moment actually :)

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: LORETTA ANDRADE
Reviews.Content: We have had it a year now and we love it, The only down fall is the remote relay to the tv is slow so you end up pushing buttons more the once.

Reviews.Title: This TV has since gone up $100.  I got it for $300, and it was worth every penny
Reviews.Author: BPP
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV about a year, still as happy as the day I got it.  Fantastic screen (think it's Samsung).  Decent speakers, but I use external speakers anyway.  Good size for a med/small living room.  No complaints yet.

Reviews.Title: VERY NICE PICTURE !!!!
Reviews.Author: Dan B
Reviews.Content: We also own a Philips, JVC and Vizio and this tv has as clear a picture as any of the others if not even clearer.  Great buy for the product you get.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: I have had it for over a year and no problems. We have it the bedroom and it has worked well

Reviews.Title: Super value!
Reviews.Author: Charlie D.
Reviews.Content: Exactly the same as the big brands at half the price. Very reliable, love it! TCL is making inroads, and it should be treated in same category as the all the more established names.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Musa Hussain
Reviews.Content: Had this TV now for about 1 year without any issues.  I have it hooked up to OTA antenna and HD channels come in great.  The colors are nice and vivid and the darks have good contrast.For the price I should have purchased 2.  The price has since gone up.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: J Star
Reviews.Content: I got a great deal on this TV. I think it was as low was 320 or something like that. It works great for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Reba04
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a new TV in the 38-42inch range when I found this one sale.  I previously have decent luck with some off brand televisions so decided to give this one a try.  I could not be happier with this television!  The picture is super crisp, and nearly a year later it still works as great as the day I took it out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for the price
Reviews.Author: Michael Cook
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a cheap TV for my mother and it has been working well for about 6 months so far. This is a very affordable TV and doesn't look terrible, which is a good thing. It's actually slightly better looking than a slightly more expensive LG TV we purchased for my mother-in-law.The only real downside is that the remote control is terrible. It has very poor range and visibility, making switching channels hit and miss, which is unfortunate. Otherwise, it's not a bad deal.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Sarah Thomas
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is awesome, only complaint is that it is a little slower than most HD tvs at turning on

Reviews.Title: Warranty leaves a lot to be desired
Reviews.Author: Ghostwriter "Johnny C"
Reviews.Content: Picture is fine for the price but mine went out after 6 months. TCL sent the parts but never sent a repairman. Ended up hiring one myself to put the parts in.

Reviews.Title: Buy of the century
Reviews.Author: Bruce Cheadle
Reviews.Content: Wanted to upgrade my TV in the spare bedroom so my guests had a HD TV to watch.  My nephew who is an electricial geek said for the price this is the best he has seen so I figured he knows.. I am so happy I listened to him;  Great price, amazing clearity and the colors are so real.  Love this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: lostcoyote
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Picture resolution is clear and sharp.  Color and light quality is excellent.  Very happy with cost and quality of this TV.

Reviews.Title: Okay. Just okay.
Reviews.Author: Thiazzi Jotunheim
Reviews.Content: Pros:Price. Ho boy, this sucker was a steal at $300 on cyber week 2011.Inputs. Three HDMI ports (one of which is also compatible with 3.5 stereo audio input--perfect for my situation)Cons:Motion ghosting. Watch a cartoon in true HD (trust me here), and you can see the obvious motion ghosting. It is less obvious but still noticeable with live actors. Normal people that are not obsessed with AV will probably not notice.Heat output. Walk past the screen after an hour or so of use and you can feel the warmth.Setup. It is hard to get the colors/contrast/brightness/gamma to look right. Possible, but hard. Configuring is absolutely necessary.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Cody Dunn
Reviews.Content: I ordered 3 of these for my business and they are excellent, high quality picture and no problems yet, highly recommend this to anyone looking for this size TV even though its an off brand...Greatest purchase I've made!

Reviews.Title: I like it.
Reviews.Author: anajfuenmayor
Reviews.Content: Well, is not the better but the price is perfect for the product. 4 star just because i can't play movies from a pendrive.

Reviews.Title: Good TV - even better at it's price
Reviews.Author: Jason Fasciolo
Reviews.Content: I've owned this TV for more than a year and think it's great - especially for the price. Several friends have noted that the picture is good, and they like the sound quality too. Overall, there are no complaints at all, and I love the price. I'll definitely consider TCL for my next electronics purchase.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Buyer
Reviews.Content: We used this Tv for our bed room. After about 7 months of using this TV there was a problem where an inverted picture appeared in a vertical strip on the right side of the TV (when looking at it). Nonetheless, I thought that it was great this TV came with a two year warranty. Thus, I contacted customer service, which was a headache, nothing got resolved and someone just took my information to tell e no trouble shotting steps, but just to call another phone number, supposedly to "level 2" support. The number I called was a company called AD Electronics USA. I called over and over before final getting a response. When I talked with the person I was told I needed to e-mail pictures of the issue and my invoive to cs10@adelectronicsusa.com, and then said he would conatcting me back. That was in December 2011!!!!!! I have now delt with the issue for almost a year and cannot get a hold of them! I do not recommend this TV, nor will I buy a TCL TV again!!!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Sweetjane
Reviews.Content: The price was a deciding factor in my purchase. Unfortunately, one of the plastic prongs that fit into the tv stand broke off before I could screw it in. What can I do now? It's part of the tv itself. It's ironic that such a tiny piece could render a 40 inch tv useless. I'll have to buy a wall mount now. I wish I had spent a little more money to get a better quality product.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Family Z, Mass.
Reviews.Content: The picture is great. At times I think it's better than my lg! I love watching hockey on it- no blurring at all. I was hesitant to buy online without viewing picture but I'm not disappointed at all. I paid $319 and have never seen it again for that price. Would still be a bargain at a higher price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a great price
Reviews.Author: Johnnies
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV almost one year ago, and so far, the TV Has performed quite well.  It has a great display, 40 inches is more than adequate for my bedroom, and not a single pixel has died over the course of owning it. Colors are fairly rich and there hasn't been any burn-in.  The sound is good, but nothing special...I really didn't expect much from a cheap-ish flat-screen TV.  If superior sound is something you want, you're probably going to buy an external sound system, anyway.  Other than that, I really can't think of anything "wrong" with it.  It is lacking some of the more advanced features the more expensive TVs offer, but it does have a 2-year warranty which is twice the industry norm, it seems.  Overall, it's been a pleasant surprise considering I'm not used to buying off-brand electronics, and a great value (I paid $329.99).  I would definitely recommend this TV to people I know.

Reviews.Title: Marvelous TV
Reviews.Author: Jan B
Reviews.Content: An excellent choice for HD TV.  Easy to use and has great clarity and sound.  Easy to view from anywhere in the room.  Is very stylish and easy to hook up other components.  Have had about a year and is still as wonderful as the day I first turned it on.  I would highly recommend this product to anyone.  Can't beat the price!

Reviews.Title: TCL L40FHDF12TA-40-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LCD HDTV with 2-Year Warranty
Reviews.Author: lee long
Reviews.Content: I have been satisfied with the  purchase of this product.  The price was good.  I would strongly recommend this product to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Love love love
Reviews.Author: Book Lover "Eve"
Reviews.Content: My original tv crapped out on me. I bought this on a whim because most tvs I saw in the store was too expensive. For the price it is wonderful, easy to put together, and very clear. The only slight problem is that the volume isn't quite loud enough. I have to raise the tv volume setting to 30 before I can here shows well.

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: Trinity
Reviews.Content: perfect size for what I needed.. Enjoying the great picture and kids love it for games. Works great with blu ray and 360....

Reviews.Title: POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE
Reviews.Author: Pebbles
Reviews.Content: I have been trying for months to get in touch with them . My TV does not have a picture and I sit on hold for hours and then it disconnects. What good is a warranty if you cant get thru to a live person.. Poor judgement on Amazon here allowing this to happen.

Reviews.Title: Too Bad There Is Not a Zero Star Rating-Worthless Warranty
Reviews.Author: John Taylor "JT"
Reviews.Content: My wife and I bought this TV for her Father's birthday in January 2012.  The price was very good and in spite of some negative reviews we figured with a 2yr. warranty how could we go wrong?A couple of months ago Dad started having trouble with the unit.  Audio became distorted through speakers and headphones.  Also changing channels sometimes took minutes to happen.He initiated a warranty claim with TCL to have the TV fixed, case #5167.  The company stated they would send parts out and have a technician call to schedule repairs.  After a month of waiting for the parts with no returned calls or emails as to the status of the parts/repairs my the parents became very dissatified.  Since it was our gift to them I felt responsible to help remedy the situation.  It seems the 2 year warranty is worth nothing but lip service.Enter Amazon!  I contacted Amazon customer service via Email and explained the situation. The same day I received an email stating that even though the TV was outside the return time frame Amazon would grant an exception.  Amazon had the TV picked up by UPS and issued a credit to my credit card.  This is such outstanding customer service!  I've always enjoyed shopping on Amazon and this is yet another reason why to shop there.  Thank you!!  We bought the parents a new Sony 40", from Amazon of course.

Reviews.Title: awful. just awful
Reviews.Author: MerdleTurtle
Reviews.Content: Very little usage and still only lasted for 5 months when it started acting strangely. Picture and audio seemed fine but the setup menu would appear at random times and then stay on in the middle of the screen. It is now November and that is how long we have been trying to get help. Support line not answered, multiple-hour hold times, multiple-hour hold times then you are dropped, etc. Latest is the tech was here yesterday and replaced the main board. New board doesn't even provide video but he cuold not get a response from the manufacturer so would not put the old one back in. Don't blame him but now we are stuck. Really sorry we bought this TV.

Reviews.Title: DEAD 40' TCL HD TV
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: Bought 12/2011 used in quest room, about 20 days total. Watching it on 11/04/12, went completely off.Checked plug, wire, cable all OK. Power switch doesn't "click" it does nothing.I see were there is a 2-yr Warranty, who is it with and who do I contact?

Reviews.Title: TCL TV 40 inch
Reviews.Author: sleepebob
Reviews.Content: I took a chance on this TV and won..I am not a professional electronics person but to me the picture looks great and it comes on every time I push the button.What more can you ask for at that price?

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Andre D. Haynes
Reviews.Content: I caught this television on sale and got it at a great price! Arrived on time, was not damaged, have had no problems with it! Love it!

Reviews.Title: Do not buy Amazon needs to discontinue this product.
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: This TV lasted 8 months.  Suddenly turned off.Customer support is anything but 'support'. Hours of waiting on hold.  Don't lose your receipt and if a 'gift' get the orignal receipt.  Even if you registered it.Warranty is useless if they don't honor it or take so long to get it fixed ..IF they 'agree' to have it fixed.  Replacing a defective part with the same part is rediculous.Save your time and money.. avoid this manufacturer and it's misleading warranty.Amazon NEEDs to discontinue this manufacturer or make good themselves on the warranty.Update Dec 2012.After having to contact the service twice, both times promised parts are being sent and a tech to install them.... 3 months later, STILL no parts.Update Feb 1, 2013Still no parts or contact.Update May 2013STILL no parts, no contact.

Reviews.Title: Great Budget TV
Reviews.Author: JimmyJoe
Reviews.Content: Being someone who doesn't watch a whole lot of TV or movies, I didn't want to spend too much when shopping for a new TV. At around $300, after searching around, I decided this was the TV for me. The TV itself looks pretty nice and the glass stand makes it look more expensive that it actually was. Definitely a big plus. As for video quality, I am really pleased with it. There is some bleed from the backlights when the screen is dark, but it is not something that has bothered me too much. Sound isn't that great although I will add that it is better than the other TCL tv I had which was the model before this one.Overall, I think this buy was really worth it, just don't have super high expectations considering the price.

Reviews.Title: TCL L40FHDF12TA
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: I would never purchase a TCL again. Less than a year old it starting to make an annoying hum when it was on. I called the service center and after 3 calls I finally found someone to take the call and send parts. 4 calls after the parts arrived I finally got a tech to show up to replace the parts. Nice guy but I gave him a screw driver to take the TV apart and it didn't fix the problem. More parts ordered by the tech that night and 4 weeks later I still don't have them. I have called 3x' and have been bumped to leaving messages for people that never call me back.Worst customer service & support ever ... wish Amazon would just replace my TV and never sell TCL again.

Reviews.Title: Wish I could give negative review... please dont buy
Reviews.Author: mamatoson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv for my parents last christmas and last saturday 15 sep 2012 the pictures turned red..  I called TCL and I was transfered to level 2 support. Unfortunately level 2 support is not obligated to pick up the phone, the phone is on automated system for the past 2 days. I called TCL again and they said that the level 2 support phone lines are down,how convenient? thats all I have to say. Furthermore whats annoying is that TCL has no way of contacting Level 2 since according to them they have been trying to call them too and there is no way they can get in touch with level 2.I have been living in US for 10 years now and this is by far the worst customer service I have encountered. It has been a lesson learned for me not to buy TCL products ever again!!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: sara
Reviews.Content: THANKS IT IS WORK VERY NICE AND SUPER NEWWWWWWWWWWWWI GOT MY OWN ONE BEFORE 5 MONTHS AND I LIKE IT

Reviews.Title: Great TV, until you have to deal with outsourced warranty support..
Reviews.Author: bluejay12
Reviews.Content: I have always been a fan of TCL tv's. We have 3, and I've recommended them to friends and family. They have proven very reliable thus far, up until this one. Have owned the L40FHDF12TA for about 6 months, as a secondary TV. It gets an hour or so of use a day, maybe two every now and then. About 4 months in, it just died. No indicator lights, no power, nothing. So of course I was directed to contact A&D; electronics (which TCL uses for their warranty support). Initial call went smoothly, had to email verification of purchase and they said they would mail parts out and call back to schedule a tech. Well, I received the TV parts within a week or so. Unfortunately that doesn't help without a technician to replace them. Never got a call back. Emailing every week I would get the same response, don't know what's going on with techs, techs are busy, etc. After a month I started attempting to call A&D;, I tried multiple days during their business hours and gave up after spending an hour+ on hold. Finally was able to get in touch with someone last week. She said she would find out what was going on with techs and call me back that day. Of course I received no call, no email. The original csr I had been contacting via email stopped responding. It has been over a month and a half since the initial call, and I am still stuck with a fairly new broken tv. If TCL wants to compete with the more highly regarded brands (which I do believe TCL tvs build quality is better than the store brand lcd's out there), they would do well to improve their reputation for warranty support.

Reviews.Title: Great tv..for $320
Reviews.Author: D. McCartney
Reviews.Content: Almost one year with no problems..one year left on warranty. This unit replaced a Sharp 32" that lasted just over one year..warranty over.  TV is wall mounted with sound bar on pool deck under roof but open to Florida's 90%+ humidity. I will notify if any problems arise..this time next year I can get rid of the huge box it came in..saving just in case I have to ship out for warranty.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Thug
Reviews.Content: TV Is in flawless condition and picture is amazing! Everything about the TV surprised me especially for the small price! all in all it was an awesome buy! Only downfall is that the people who ship out tv's shipped me the wrong screws for my mount. but I bought a wall mount anyways so all gravy!

Reviews.Title: Great deal....horrible customer service
Reviews.Author: JEnnifer MAik
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV January 23rd, 2012 for a great deal.  The TV worked great for awhile and we were happy to have purchased it.  The second week of July the TV stopped turning on, we would get a blue light but the screen remained black.  My husband called right away to get it fixed since we bought with the 2 year warranty.  They told us to email them our Amazon receipt and would send out the part in 5-7 days and have a repairman come out to fix it.  We called a week later and they tried to tell us that they never received our email and to sent it to them again.  So we had to wait another 5-7 days later and finally received on the 28th of July and then had to call back to have a service man come out.  Excuse after excuse we got from customer service about why no had been sent out with my husband calling every other day to find out what was happening.  Finally more than a month after our TV first broke a repairman came out on August 14th and he tried to fix the TV but, said that the part they sent us was dead.  He requested that they overnight us a new part and send him out again to fix the TV.  A few days later we still had not received the part so we called and were told that they don't overnight parts and that we would have to pay to have it overnighted they only ship standard.  Today is August 27th and we still have not received a new part, a phone call, or anything.  If not for customer service, there wouldn't be an issue.  Save yourself a lot of hassles.

Reviews.Title: Unhappy customer
Reviews.Author: Unhappy customer
Reviews.Content: I received this tv as a gift, however upon setting up the tv I noticed  there was a line down the Center of the screen. We sent it back to amazon, and now today the second tv is worst than the first;(  The same line and a cracked screen!!!!I'm not impressed!

Reviews.Title: Dead in 6 Months
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: This TV was the nicest Christmas gift, my first large screen tv.  What a surprize.  About as surprized as I was six months later when there was nothing on screen or sound. Received parts, didn't unwrap them.  Called back to let them know and they said a Technician would be in touch soon.  Well by the second week of August I was done waiting.  Amazon was fine with my sending it back with credit to my son.  Now all I'm trying to do is find out how to mail the parts back since they no longer belong to me.  Can't find a phone number for A & D Electronics USA but will keep looking.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: K. Lock
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV.  I've had it about 6 months and have had no problems at all!  The TV came quickly and was packaged wonderfully.  It was easy to get it all set up (the stand was a little tricky to get it on tight enough. If your TV wobbles, then it is not on tight enough).  Once the TV and stand are put together, the TV is very sturdy and does not wobble at all.  I was initially worried it would given the slim neck and glass base, but the TV has not moved at all even when bumped by an elbow.  The picture is great with no glare problems.  I currently have the TV across from windows and I only get a slight glare.  It's not enough to bother me to move the TV to another spot though!  I have the TV set up with a cable box/DVR and a PS3.  I have no problem finding enough inputs on the TV to fit those gadgets and more if needed.  The picture is awesome and it is even better when in HD.  There are several screen formats that you can choose to use: stretch/shrink the picture or change the background color/tint based on what you're viewing. I can't think of a single thing to complain about for this model.  Great price, great warranty, great picture!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great price!
Reviews.Author: Jose Ponce
Reviews.Content: So far after purchasing the TV everything has been working great and very happy with the picture quality and features that I wanted in a nice LCD TV. Regular SD and HD looks great, just some small adjustments on the picture settings and the picture will look very good.

Reviews.Title: Never heard of TCL but it hasn't failed yet...
Reviews.Author: Andy Yi
Reviews.Content: I ordered this because it was $330 and I could not find a better deal anywhere else. I had a gift card and had been robbed at the time. I haven't had any problems with it. I use HDMI (PlayStation 3 & Xbox 360), Composite (Wii) and AV (PlayStation 2) on it. No connection problems yet. My only problem was the set up. It has a glass base that needs to be screwed from the bottom. It would've been better to just have a base where the TV can just be set into place first. That really bothered me. However, the glass base looks nice.Overall, it's nothing special. I only bought it because of the price.Funny Note: When labeling your Inputs, the Blu-ray label is spelled "Blue-ray". A minor problem I have with the labels is that you can't enter your own custom label. You can only choose the options that are available.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: R. Martin
Reviews.Content: Great TV. No problems at all. Very happy with this. HD picture over antennae is some of the best I've ever seen. I use for Netflix on Roku and DVDs. The audio is what you would expect from a built in speaker system. It's not great but works. This TV was the best deal I found after looking everywhere for months. I paid 350 in March.

Reviews.Title: Excellent television at an excellent price
Reviews.Author: D. Hill
Reviews.Content: The title of my review says it all. There really is nothing more to say. I bought a high quality 40 inch TV at 32 inch prices (that is, until they hiked the price on this one by a hundred bucks, even more than the newer model's price).  Fantastic picture.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Experience!
Reviews.Author: Theomar
Reviews.Content: When we ordered this TV I didn't know what to expect.  We have had the TV in service for about 4-5 months.  It was shipped and delivered perfectly and we love it!  The factory picture needed a personal touch, but all in all an outstanding product so far.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Dragon
Reviews.Content: This was a steal on Amazon, and I am so glad i took part in it!! I use this TV all the time for movies, games, and regular cable.  Sound quality and graphics are amazing, I have absolutely nothing bad to say about it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV but has bugs
Reviews.Author: jnut
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for the money!!!  However, the audio for the audio output will stop working a lot when you switch TV inputs or the TV switches HD resolution.  This is a really annoying problem but I would still buy it again given what I know now.

Reviews.Title: Best for the price
Reviews.Author: vicky8519
Reviews.Content: Best for the price, been using it for 5 months, no problems at all. Th best for short term use.

Reviews.Title: Great colors, but the LCD screen gives off oven-like heat
Reviews.Author: DaleG
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with the vivid colors. I'd venture to say it tops my 50" Panasonic in this department. However, the LCD screen gives off a lot of heat. I pass by it and it feels like walking by my oven at 350 degrees. I could do without the heat.. my 50" Plazma Panasonic doesn't give off any heat.

Reviews.Title: No problems yet
Reviews.Author: polishp86
Reviews.Content: I've had this since Christmas 2011.  I have it mounted with a cheetah mount in my bedroom.  It's the perfect size for a bedroom and I have not had any problems at all with the TV.  It has all the necessary hookups and the sound isn't too bad from the small speakers.  I love being able to hook up my laptop through it via HDMI.  I got this on a lightning deal, so the price couldn't be beat and I still haven't seen a TV this size for as cheap as I paid.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING DEAL!
Reviews.Author: JoJo
Reviews.Content: So, we weren't sure if we should get this item because it isn't a 'brand name' and it was so cheap, how could it possibly be a great product?  Well, we LOVE it!  The picture is GREAT, it was super easy to set up, it connects easily with all our gadgets... we have an XBox, surround sound, Blue-Ray, and HDMI smart phone cable hooked up to it.  It has easy to access ports on the side.The design is sleek and attractive.  Overall, this was a FABULOUS buy and I'm so glad we bought it!!

Reviews.Title: Honestly and pleasantly surprised
Reviews.Author: Dixon A. Phillips "phillid2"
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV and was hoping i had not made a mistake given some of the negative reviews.  TV came, unpacked it and setup the glass base, plugged it into the cablebox and electrical supply and was pleasantly surprised by the quality i got.  Picture needed a little tweaking, but once it was done (about 3 mins tops) i was all set to relax and watch some movies.  Good sound quality and lots of ports for expansion..even one for usb to show pics and play music..so you have a large digital picture frame for when you are not actively watching tv.  Would definitely buy this brand again.

Reviews.Title: Low price, High Quality. Don't Waste Money on Brand Name
Reviews.Author: TrueThursday "TT"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for $320. I had low expectations because it was such a low price for a 40" set. I was pleasantly surprised to find that it works great.I have a PS3 hooked up to it for blu-ray and Netflix, and an Xbox for games.The only beef I have with this set is that it does have some motion blur, which is to be expected with a 60 HZ set. It's only noticeable to me on animated type shows, like South Park. This is the most obvious when they show the character's eyes in South Park, which is just a black dot surrounded by a white circle to make their eye. If there is any movement, you can see where the pupil of their eye was just a second before. This is because cartoons use the whitest and blackest pixils, so it makes it obvious.Game play is great on this tv, no lag while playing MW3. Blu-ray looks great, but the sound is sub par so you will want to get a sound bar for this set. The price to quality ratio is off the charts, don't spend an extra $100-$200 for a brand name set unless the brand name on the TV means more to you than the picture. It's easy to set up. Screw the stand to the T.V, plug the sucker in and you're good. I got it out of the box myself and i'm no Hulk by any means.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for, or maybe less
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It was cheap, it was big, but the color was terrible. there just weren't enough adjustments to make the red and the darkness go away.  I had to change color settings each time I switched inputs and for just about every different show or time of day. and no matter what it was too red, and too dark, yet washed out at the same time.Thanks so very much Amazon for the free return. I bought a 37" Samsung, and it looked so much better out of the box. I tweaked the red just a little, but everything looks fine. I have a mix of component and hdmi sources, as well as ota digital and analog cable.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, better than name brands
Reviews.Author: Tara N.
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to upgrade my tiny 23" LCD and I do not regret it. It is excellent for gaming and watching movies (which I do a lot of). The sound quality is amazing, especially since the speakers are in the front unlike most TVs that have them in the back requiring you to buy speakers. The picture quality is also very good. It's black is truly black and the colors and contrast would make you think you paid $1000 for it. Overall, I would definitely recommend this TV to anyone looking for something that will last them a long time while allowing them to get their money's worth.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: osme02
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV around Christmas for $300.  I was nervous about the purchase but I have to say this turned out to be a steal.  For the price I doubt you could beat it.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Vfriend
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv from the reviews on Amazon so also want to throw my 2 cents in.  This is really a great tv for the price. The picture is excellent and the sound better than what I thought it would be, too.  Impressive number of HDMI's and other connection possiblities, especially at this price point.  With a tv in this price range, you can afford to upgrade more often as new things come out or put them in every room.  I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Best. Deal. Ever.
Reviews.Author: fellanie "mel"
Reviews.Content: I got this TV about a month ago - it is AMAZING!  Looks great, sounds great, has a ton of connections for different devices - it is amazeballz. The only complaints (very small ones) are that it does take a while to turn on (but I totally don't care), and there is no remote code for it so you can't use a cable box remote with it.  I've seen in other reviews that you can use a Harmony remote with it, but we're making due just fine with 2 remotes - maybe someday we'll upgrade, but it doesn't bother me much.  This TV is WORTH EVERY PENNY!  And you're not spending very many of them (pennies, that is) - so get it while it's hot!DO NOT SHOP FURTHER - YOU HAVE FOUND YOUR TV!!!

Reviews.Title: TCL 40" TV Purchase
Reviews.Author: lm
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen purchase, I love it, perfect size for my smaller place not too big.  Picture is great,sound is pretty good, can always attach speaker and the update download completely solved the problem of the TV turning on randomly not an issue anymore and very easy to do.Very very happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Just what the doctor ordered!!!
Reviews.Author: DeJay "theprofessional"
Reviews.Content: From the other reviews about this TV I knew I was in safe waters with this purchase. I received the TV yesterday, mounted it, plugged in the HDMI cable to my verizon box and bam! She turns on and the picture is beautiful and fits my room perfectly!! I'm somewhat of a picky person when it comes to my house and my belongings; I like nice things, with quality and at a good price regardless of the manufacturers name. This is a great purchase at $317.The picture looks good but could use some tweeking. Does anyone have TV settings that looked good?

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Bargain
Reviews.Author: bryan
Reviews.Content: My new TV looks great, sounds great and was very easy to set up. The picture quality is excellent. For the price we payed, my wife and I couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Don't be afraid to buy this TV
Reviews.Author: Mudgirl
Reviews.Content: Mixed reviews about this TV, and buying online, made me leery but after researching a lot I decided to take the plunge. I'm glad I did. TV arrived very quickly, set up was simple (love the glass base) picture and sound are great-especially for the price. My Samsung monitor has tinny sound-this does not. I am very pleased with both the TV and Amazon.I've had this TV for almost a year now and am still very happy with it. I think I'm blessed not to have any problems as I haven't seen one positive concerning the warranty. My experience is still 5 star, though.

Reviews.Title: TCL HDTV 40-inch
Reviews.Author: rj44646
Reviews.Content: I have purchased 2 of these televisions for my household. the picture quality is excellent on both TVs. The input/outputs allow all the game system, PC, laptop, DVD player,and media player to be plugged in at one time. The controls are easy to use and the extra features are a plus.

Reviews.Title: Outta This World!
Reviews.Author: Frenchie "Sandy"
Reviews.Content: I love this television. I was hesitant to purchase a name I had never heard of but because of all the positive reviews, positive research and the price, I took a chance. The picture is beautiful, sharp, clear and distinct and it's a breeze to hook up. I'll buy another when the need arises!

Reviews.Title: satisfied
Reviews.Author: KC
Reviews.Content: I'm very satisfied with this TV,It's easy to understand and program, just plug it in and let it go.It was delivered in about a week, not the the 6 weeks like others.

Reviews.Title: very competitive price and quality is fine
Reviews.Author: ZB
Reviews.Content: The quality of the TV is fine, compared with the price I paid for a 40 inch TV. it is totally worth.

Reviews.Title: TCL= "the creative life" who would have believed & a two yr. warranty
Reviews.Author: leevon wells
Reviews.Content: It's a nice tube and a big enough screen 40 in. really it's just as good as the big brand names, it has a lot going for it 1080p & on and on !

Reviews.Title: Great tv at an affordable price
Reviews.Author: kbush
Reviews.Content: Picked one of these up in February 2012 at $300 used (very good condition). Product arrived and although the condition stated it had a scratch on top and on the stand, the "scratch" on the stand was only damage to the plastic covering. Have had this tv for over a month and have loved it so far. Plenty of ports to connect everything i have in the room and it looks great when playing in 1080p. Only negatives I have found with it is that there is little depth to the blacks and expect to use the original remote because I have found that when using my direct tv remote it has a hard time sensing the input. Overall it is a great tv and at the price the few negatives are easily overlooked.

Reviews.Title: Only a month in, but I love it
Reviews.Author: Christopher J. Nelson
Reviews.Content: So far I've only had the TV a month, but it has been excellent for the value.  The picture quality is amazing, the sound is very clear, and at half way up you can hear it across the house (which actually drives me crazy, but it is still clear sound).

Reviews.Title: No out-of-box problems, works great!
Reviews.Author: Deanne Taylor "DT"
Reviews.Content: I have to say I'm pretty impressed with how the TCL "The Creative Life" 40-inch 1080P 60Hz LCD HDTV is working for us. We've plugged in our laptops and we're streaming video on a "high-speed" DSL connection. Simple as plug and play. No missing pixels, straight-forward setup. I can't think of one bad or neutral thing to say about this screen. Great TV for the bedroom if you have the space, or for a small living room. Quality of picture is great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, glad I bought
Reviews.Author: C. Bell
Reviews.Content: I had never heard of TCL so I did as much research as I could on it.  Ended up buying it and crossing my fingers.  This TV is AWESOME.  Great picture, great sound.  I mostly play my PS3 on it and it autoadjusts depending on if I'm gaming, or blu-raying, or watching cable.  Great TV and great price.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Ms.Kay
Reviews.Content: I'm watching my Tv right now and I love the picture. It's a great picture for a reasonable price. I almost didn't buy it cause I was worried it wouldn't last but it has. A great buy! One thing......Be careful and watch how its delivered, my packaging was not secure and the box came apart while trying to take the t.v inside.

Reviews.Title: WOW FOR THIS PRODUCT TO BE USED IT IS WONDERFUL!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: I PRUCHASED THIS TV ABOUT THREE MONTHS AGO, AND I WAS REALLY UNSURE IF I HAD MADE A GOOD CHOICE, BUT WHEN IT CAME IN THE ORIGINAL BOX WITH ALL OF THE PAPERWORK. THEN WHEN I HOOKED EVERYTHING UP AND I WAS ABLE TO SEE THE PICTURE AND HEAR THE SOUND I KNEW THAT I MADE A GOOD CHOICE. THIS TV IS THE BEST!!!!!!!!!!!!! PERFECT 10'S

Reviews.Title: Just right - Update
Reviews.Author: dgsavage
Reviews.Content: I purchase this for my bedroom, January 2012. It's just the right size for the space and does what it should. The picture isn't excellent but it is good.  I give it five stars because it is what is it.  No misrepresentation.Update.  The TV stop working in December 2013, one month before the warranty expired.  A serviceman came to my home to repair it but could not.  I was told to send the TV to the company to have it repaired of replaced.  I did.  I received a call saying they could not repair it so would replace it however, they don't have a compatible TV to replace it with.  Today is March 1, 2014 and I'm waiting:-(Don't buy a TCL.

Reviews.Title: great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Bob Weiner
Reviews.Content: First off, if you've waited this long to get an HDTV, and especially a larger one, you've got to get with the program. Everyone in the house agrees that this is the best thing we've purchased in years....terrific picture, easy to use. We believe it's completely changed how we watch television. With that said, when you turn the set on, there is a scary pause until the picture actually arrives. After reading many reviews about this model suddenly not turning on at all, it's a little unnerving to wait and wait and wait....and finally work. Maybe thats a quirk, but it's annoying. The sound is pretty bad, but we have it hooked up to the stereo, which takes care of that issue.All in all, it's a terrific bargain. Get one!

Reviews.Title: Review TCL 40" TV
Reviews.Author: G.L.
Reviews.Content: Wow! What a great deal. Was looking for a replacement for my ancient 29" and found this. Great picture, good variety of inputs, RCA audio outputs; couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: my review
Reviews.Author: AishaE
Reviews.Content: I tried to purchase a flat screen locally, but by the time I was READY READY, they were either sold out, or cost a bit more. I am so pleased with this flat screen from Amazon.com!  When I watch TV in my room at night, it's almost like being at the theater!! I plan on, in the future, ordering an even bigger one for my living room...it's definitely coming!! Thanks Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: fluffy
Reviews.Content: I enjoy this product.Iam very please with the service i received.Who ever try this flat screen television will be well pleased.

Reviews.Title: TCL HD Television
Reviews.Author: Bitsy
Reviews.Content: I have worked in the television industry over 25 years on the technical side. After much debating, I purchased the television around the end January. I amazed of the picture quality.It is about as good as Samsung or Sony.It was delivered by Fed Ex. The box was in excellent shape and the television was packaged well. The stand is easy to put on and is quite sturdy. My only descrepancy is the light LED spill on the upper two corners. This is par for the course with LCD telelevision.My only regret is that I didn't buy two at the same time. Definetly an excellent television for the price.Does anyone know why the price keeps changing so often ?  As of March 30th, the price is $448.00. The price is much closer to name brands.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Shari
Reviews.Content: I am not into gaming and I didn't need anything extravegant for my living room. It is just my daughter and I. I purchased this TV and was very satisfied! Audio is not the best, but I didn't expect perfection with such a deal on a TV. Watch the price though.. I notice they change it all the time. I paid $349.00 for it, I checked the price again on Sunday because my brother wanted one and then it was $449.00, not today (4 days later) it is down to $399.00. So make sure you are watching the price and you can get it at the best deal possible because they do change the price often.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: lindaxyz
Reviews.Content: I am no way tech savey so purchasing this TV was a bit scary since I did not recognize the name TCL. I did research it and read lots of reviews (Thank you AMAZON shoppers!)before making my decision. Nevermind the lack of a known name brand, I was also skeptical with this purchase due to the low price.(under $300. and stayed under $300. due to the Super Saver shipping!)I do believe, for the most part,  you get what you pay for so I was realisticaly expecting a cheap TV but really hoping for a "good" cheap TV! Haha. I am happily relieved and pleased to say today that this TV was an awesome buy!It is nice looking and was easy to set up. The glass base, instead of plastic was a nice surprise.(No cheap look or feel there!) The 40 inch screen is a great size for the master bedroom. If it were a larger size, I might worry about the 60Hz but it is fine at this size. We view from a distance of approximately 10 ft.  At this distance, the picture is great and the sound is good. The sound is ok for the bedroom but, it might be lacking in a larger setting such as the living room or den. Adding external speakers would fix that problem. The picture is very clear, but I found it needed tweeking to tone down the color. No problem. The only "con" I can thing of was, I was concerned to hear a rattle, like a loose screw inside the TV while putting on the base but after setting up, it doesn't seem to be affecting the function of the TV. If it causes problems later, I will update. All in all,  It is a much better TV than I had hoped for and I couldn't be more pleased. After using it daily for a month now, I have had no problems. I would recommend this TV without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: Great TV For the Price
Reviews.Author: Mosdad
Reviews.Content: This is an exceptional TV for the price & it's the easiest TV to configure that I have owned.  It's so good, in fact, that I purchased 3 of them in the past 4 mos.  I highly recommend this product.As an added comment, one of the TVs arrived with a cracked screen.  Replacement was easier than purchasing locally.  I had the new TV within 3 days and was provided the shipping label on-line for return of the damaged unit.Thanks for a very easy purchase!

Reviews.Title: Solid
Reviews.Author: Max
Reviews.Content: Dont let the brand and price sway you. As has been mentioned this is a samsung made panel and it shows...literally. The picture is excellent. By far the best bang for the buck you will find.

Reviews.Title: good buy for the price
Reviews.Author: stosh67
Reviews.Content: This is mmy first big flatscreen hdtv. It is a good picture with plwnty of aux/audio-video hook ups. There is also a good picture with plenty of picture options.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Jakefreakingwalker
Reviews.Content: I was so scared to buy a TV online, but it's just so much cheaper. Fedex wasn't too careful with the package (flopping it around like it was a pillow) but it wasn't damaged in any way! Set it up on the wall with surround sound. Although, compared to other HDTVs I've watched, the speakers on this are much better. I was surprised how loud it is.

Reviews.Title: Not Impressed!
Reviews.Author: Angelina
Reviews.Content: I had my TV for 2 months and one day it just stopped working. If I was the seller of this product, I would research what I am selling. I have seen several comments about the same issue. Not worth your time or your money. I was not impressed with this product!

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: waterwks4me
Reviews.Content: Absolutely no complaints.  So far so good.  Great price!  Great picture! I would buy this tv again if I needed another one.

Reviews.Title: Replaced an old TV
Reviews.Author: TAY
Reviews.Content: I still had the old model tv in my bedroom, so I said need to up grade my bedroom TV, this was perfect.  Nice size, color and model very easy to use and also wasnt alot of trouble to get out the box.  Price worked for me too....very nice......I LOVE AMAZON.

Reviews.Title: This TV is sick!
Reviews.Author: Stephan Turnbull
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my college dorm room, the room itself is pretty small so the TV definitely fills it up.After setting it up (which is extremely easy) I realized how good of a decision I had made buying this TV. For $320 this TV is definitely the best you'll get, the screen is crystal clear, plenty of plug ins at the back (something like 3 HDMIs so I have one for my laptop, one for my PS3 and a spare). The only thing that could be better is the speakers, but they're pretty typical for TVs really.Awesome TV, definitely buy it if you're fairly tight on money (college student) - you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: my TCL
Reviews.Author: al
Reviews.Content: I have say it is the best deal going. For the price you cant go wrong. Very EZ to use ! I wish it was 120 Hz, But I am A Happy Camper!!!TCL L40FHDF11TA 40-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LCD HDTV with 2-Year Warranty, Black

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: sam128
Reviews.Content: TCL 40", 1080P LCD HDTV had already been reviewed by many customers before I decided to buy it. There had been a couple of problems that made me wary of buying this TV, but as I kept reading newer reviews over a one month period, the problems seemed to be rectified. After having this TV for one month now, I have had no problems, and both my wife and I are enjoying the quality of the television. Having the two year warranty also set this TV apart from similar TV's on the market. So if you are hesitating on buying the TV, go ahead and buy it, it is a good TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Finally found a cheap basic universal remote for my TCL 40".
Reviews.Author: Lake Waters "L. Waters"
Reviews.Content: Actually, I found 3 total.RCA RCRH02BR (2 Function)(Bought it for another TV but I found out it works on the TCL, basic functions only. $8 at some Best Buys but will not be restocked. Has 2 very oversized buttons for volume and channel.) I tried it's auto search and it found the code 2434 which worked. There were no TCL codes offered, the 2434 was one of the several RCA codes it listed)RCA RCRH02BRTwo Device RemoteThe others are:Sony RMVZ320 Remote Control Up To 7 Compatible Video Components(Doesn't operate: Mode(picture format), OTA Guide, Favorites)Sony RMVLZ620(Costs about $5 more than the other Sony but it's programmable so all functions can work)

Reviews.Title: great bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: flowergurl84
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my tv....the only downfall is that there is no sleep timer, and it is an offbrand so my satellite remote cannot be programmed to it....other than that i picked it because of the price and the reviews i read on it told me it was a good buy, i have not been disappointed, nice size, nice picture and the price is gonna be very hard to match....

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: pwbntx
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. Fantastic picture quality, sound, and price. I would strongly recommend this product to anyone. Shipping was on time. Thanks, AMAZON!

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: C. Subramanian "Chella"
Reviews.Content: I would say this buy is worth the money every penny. I bought this hesitantly as it was cheaply priced, but so far working really good.

Reviews.Title: Its okay if you dont use it a lot
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Roberts
Reviews.Content: First, Its wobbly in the base. Second, it takes a few minutes to come on and start working and third,  sometimes for no reason the screen turns green and you need to shut it off and back on again. If you dont need an everyday tv, its okay.

Reviews.Title: Flickering on the first night, updated
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: 03/12/2012: I called TCL from the number listed in the service locations on their website TCLUSA.com They forwarded me to a secondary company who handles their warranty calls. I was unable to get through on their phone lines and would get hung up on atthe fifteen minute mark. I was able to track down an email to the company cs12@adelectronicsusa.com. I emailed them informing them of my dissatisfaction and within the minute I had a call back from a CS rep who was able to get me mainboard replacement sent to me once they had my proof of purchase. The customer was truly fantastic once I was able to get through. She informed me they were having issues with their phone trunks.I received this set on Saturday March 10 2012 via overnight delivery from amazon. I plugged it in and the set looked wonderful. I was impressed with the picture quality. After having it on for less than half an hour it started to develop a flickering issue. It is now flickering on a good portion of the screen and it is brand new. I will be contacting them in the morning as it is after business hours to see how they will resolve the issue and how the warranty will work. Thankfully I can still return it to Amazon if need be.

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: Kurt Mayberry "emergency zone"
Reviews.Content: Like most who bought the TV, I am happy wiht my purchase.  Price is right and the picture and sound are good.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Gerald E. Harris "gharris"
Reviews.Content: Great price and great television.  I have had this now for a couple of months and no problems.  This is actually the second one.  The first would not turn on.  Amazon sent another which I received in 2 days and they picked up the first one.  Easiest and quickest replacement I've ever seen.  This unit works very well.  Great picture, remote is quite nice, sound is fine for me. I have other plasma and lcd televisions, Samsung and Philips brand, and the picture on this TCL is just as good.  Fantastic deal.

Reviews.Title: great LCD TV for a great price!
Reviews.Author: G. Meyer "garbagefile"
Reviews.Content: i bought this TV a few weeks ago on amazon for $325 shipped. i missed the deals for around $300, but i'm not complaining about $25 as it's still a great deal!the color on this set is great. i have another LCD that has not-so-great color (sansui), and compared to that this is the polar opposite. i don't have a better or name-brand TV to compare it to, but i have seen other sets while shopping around and this one stands up to those. i have enjoyed HD movies and video games on my TCL at all hours and have been able to watch at night as well as during the day (night is great - as in in the dark).the resolution on this TV is also great. older movies that are not HD seem grainy, as the original format is maxed out. newer movies display better and as good as i could expect.modern LCDs of this size can compare with plasmas of the same size - motion blur is not a problem as it used to be. and while color may not be as rich, it's a fraction of the cost.the sound on the TCL leaves something to be desired. it's not horrible, but i plan on getting some external speakers for it. which isn't even that bad, because i want my surround sound to come from separate sources anyhow.there are 3 HDMI inputs, and a bunch of others which i don't use. actually my xbox is going in thru the component inputs. there's a USB that you can use to view photos, but you cannot view videos. for me that's ok because i have other ways to do that.programming my FIOS remote was easy enough. actually, i sweated it out for a while because i couldn't find anything on it. but then i tried the RCA remote codes for my Vz remote and the first one worked.like others reported, i received the set about 2 business days after ordering it. this allowed me to plan a pickup of my old set by the local thrift store :)overall i find this to be a great TV deal. i've noticed that other TVs are following suit and lowering prices, but i have no regrets buying this one. 2 year warranty...oh yeah :D

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Wonderful Price!
Reviews.Author: Will Burgess
Reviews.Content: I got this TV after Christmas as a gift for the family.  The picture and audio are great, and I can't believe the price for a TV manufactured by Samsung.  TCL is on my radar for all future TV purchases, that's for sure!

Reviews.Title: You can't go wrong, great value!
Reviews.Author: drdoug99 "Reader, gamer, etc."
Reviews.Content: For the price, this TV is excellent. The only thing I do with this TV is play PS3 games and watch movies and TV streaming from my computer, using the PS3's wifi. No problems with any blurred images, or ghosting or whatever.I set the TV to Cinematic mode, turned sharpness to 0...the only thing I have to do is change the brightness level for certain games....some games are darker than others and I have to adjust the brightness accordingly. I'm not an expert, but I know what basic over saturation is and when things just don't look right. The lighting in the TV is pretty even, blacks look black, colors look natural.I don't care about the TV's included speakers, I will never use them and people that do use the built in speakers are idiots. I have a 5.1 surround sound that is not fancy by any means, it's a 200 dollar Pioneer sound system that was made for the Xbox 360 like 6 years ago that you can't even buy anymore, but it's a great sounding system for the price and I'll continue to use it until it dies.I'm sorry but even if I was using this TV in the bedroom, which I also think is stupid and I don't understand why people watch TV in the bedroom, a bedroom is for having sex and sleeping...watching TV is meant for the living room on a couch. Anyway, even if for some reason beyond my control a TV magically appeared in my bedroom, I would hook up external speakers, as all speakers built in to TV's since the creation of the very first TV have always sounded at best sub par, and at worst more horrible than even a pair of 6x9 1980's car speakers that had a blown voice coil but people think it sounds good cuz it has the "bass". A flat screen speaker simply does not have the proper dimensions to accurately reproduce sound of any type...forget about bass, and even the mids and highs will be tinny or harsh or just bad since I doubt they have actual separate piezo tweeters or anything actually good....so just save your ears and get a 50 dollar set of Logitech computer speakers to connect to the TV, it will be light years beyond any built in computer speakers.Bottom line is, this TV is awesome, I would not hesitate to buy TCL in the future in an even larger size when it's time for me to upgrade. This TV has more input and outputs than all the TV's I looked at in the price range...I would have to pay over 500 dollars to get a better TV of the same size or slightly larger 42 inch, and that was out of my price range, plus none of the other TV's had a 2 year warranty, or a USB port. You simply can't find a better value.

Reviews.Title: #winning (Remote code for Xfinity remote is 10047, an RCA code)
Reviews.Author: Mizu-wa-nonde-mas
Reviews.Content: #!/bin/bashProbably the best price/performance available. TCL also makes RCA (an old American brand). Anyway, it has a real 2-year warranty and looks very reliable. I like "AK-47 reliable", and although this is not as reliable as an AK-47, it may very well be the AK-47 of 40" TV's.Also, I hooked up my fire-breathing gaming desktop to it via the HDMI and the graphics are stunning. This TCL 40" expresses more detail clarity than my 32" Auria, by far!If you have an Xfinity remote, your remote code is 10047 (which is an RCA code). Your welcome.

Reviews.Title: TCL 40" great TV
Reviews.Author: Tink
Reviews.Content: This TV is great for the money.  I ordered it on Friday and Amazon had it delivered on Saturday in perfect condition.  I love shopping on Amazon.  It was easy to set up, the picture is really good, the sound is good, my dvd player is hooked up to it and so far everything about it is just awesome. I like the options you have on the menu for changing the picture appearance from cinematic to sports.  I watch the sports view.  I highly recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Seems to be a Great buy!
Reviews.Author: dj9633
Reviews.Content: I ordered this a couple of weeks ago after  my 50 inch DLP Projection stopped working. The first TV I received on Tuesday, had a mark on the screen that was distracting , Another Tv was sent out which I got Saturday, great service Amazon!Now to the TV, I am very happy with it, the blue ray movies looked amazing, We ordered a Direct tv movie in 1080p it also had a great picture! Anything in HD looks good even 720 p. However the picture in SD is not as good as my old set, however I still give it 5 stars due to the value. The sound is better than my Mother's 46 inch she paid around 600 for. I guess my only concern now is how long will it last? If I get only 1 year of service out of it that's still less than a dollar a day!

Reviews.Title: Best buy this year.
Reviews.Author: Gail E. Blanchard "ineedsoup"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV just before Christmas - one of today's deals.  Bought it because of the price, thinking it would be good for the guest room where grandchildren watch TV.  It is now in my living room having changed places with a 32 inch Visio.  We also have a 32 inch Samsung and a 24 inch Toshiba.  This TV outshines them all.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: pippy
Reviews.Content: color and sound is good,specially for movie,my family enojy it very much.easy to set up,change channele, a lot of fun.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great price
Reviews.Author: jeremy
Reviews.Content: Pros:Picture quality is good.2 year warranty1080pGreat priceCons:Can't think of any - maybe it would be nice if the TV had a channel guide

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive and still a very good picture
Reviews.Author: Gary A. Buckingham
Reviews.Content: I don't always go with name brands because they tend to be expensive. Never had heard of this brand before and thought I would take a chance. Setup was easy, great picture quality. No problems. Would recommend..

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: Gjasi Leite
Reviews.Content: I am  very happy with this television. I do not have any complaints. The size and quality plus the price is unbelievable.

Reviews.Title: Lots of Screen Space for the Price
Reviews.Author: Crestviewer
Reviews.Content: Given the price for this television, we've been pleasantly surprised by its quality. Here's a hit list of our impressions:- It's packed well (even though parts of our television's box were dented and even cut, the television came through shipping unscathed);- It unpacks fairly easily;- The glass base is solid and easy to attach to the television;- There are a good number of component attachment ports (and for the type of connections that most devices have these days - HDMI, USB, RGB, etc)- The remote control is fine...the buttons you need / expect without being too overwhelming;- Television menus aren't special looking (no incredible graphics or layout), but they're straight-forward and fairly intuitive;- Initial set-up (language [it starts in English], time zone, channels) is fine. I had to start this process myself (instructions had made it look as though it would start automatically), but it didn't take long to complete.- The picture is nice. Refresh rate isn't as good as more expensive flat screens, but you don't notice this for most shows.- Sound seems fine (we don't watch television that loud so others will be better judges of this feature).

Reviews.Title: My TV review
Reviews.Author: Rashell
Reviews.Content: I have had the tv since Jan.So for we are enjoying the performance of the system so far.I have only a 2 year warranty I hope and pray it last me for years.

Reviews.Title: For the price this ia great TV
Reviews.Author: JT
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. I use it in the basement where I have all of my excersise equipment and it truly serves it's purpose.

Reviews.Title: Great so far!
Reviews.Author: Tom H
Reviews.Content: So far, so good!  I was wary of an unknown brand but the overwhelming number of positive reviews convinced me.  I'm glad I did!  From what I've read elsewhere, the LCD panel itself is made by Samsung, and it does not disappoint!  The blacks are a lot darker than the 37" Philips I used prior to this one.  It took some getting used to but it's great now; more realistic.  Comments about poor sound don't affect me as I run it through my home theater sound system.  I love the accessibility and quantity of inputs and outputs.  The price has been going up since late 2011, so don't delay and get one now!

Reviews.Title: Great product, amazing price
Reviews.Author: Bosspigg
Reviews.Content: We bought this tv when our old one bit the dust. I was hesitant because of the no-name thing as well as the super low price tag. It had to be too good to be true, right? Well, we've had it for a couple of months now and it still works flawlessly. I'm totally satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Smokin Hot Deal!!!
Reviews.Author: Shopohooolic
Reviews.Content: We paid $350 for this 40 inch flat screen. All I can say is WOW! Really. I was a little worried as to what kind of flat screen I would be getting for this price but I'm soooo glad we took a chance and trusted all the customer reviews. Positives- the picture is brilliant! Negatives- the sound is low quality. We read the reviews so we knew to expect low quality on the sound so we bought a surround system to go along with this tv. The remote is cheap but hey, I'm not complaining!!! Thanks to TLC for producing a price friendly quality flat screen!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Starsmay
Reviews.Content: Great TV!!! Speakers are a little weak but as long as you have surround sound it doesnt matter. And it also takes a bit to turn on but still worth the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Big, Basic TV for a Bargain Price
Reviews.Author: A. Costello
Reviews.Content: I read a lot of reviews before I ordered this TV, so thanks to everyone who posted reviews at Amazon.com.  Picking a TV is hard!!  I selected this one because it's several hundred dollars less than any other 40" one I found, and it had good reviews.  We paid $329 for it and are very happy.  One pixel was out when we took it out of the box but it's not noticeable.  Setup was ridulously easy - just attach the base with 4 screws and you're done.  It takes longer to throw out the packing materials!  Performance has been fine, my only complaint would be that it takes a little too long to switch channels.  Sound quality is not great but I did not expect it to be.Overall this TV was a great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: TCL 40 inch TV
Reviews.Author: tony
Reviews.Content: This TV was delivered promptly; was easy to uncrate and hook up; works great and has a wonderful picture. It has a two year warranty.  All in all it's a great value. I would recommend it to anyone who is looking to upgrade your TV viewing.

Reviews.Title: Remote code void
Reviews.Author: Clinton S Zimmer
Reviews.Content: This TV by TCL does not come with a remote code to work with your cble box. Requires TV remote and cable box remote to operate.  Excellent picture quality.

Reviews.Title: TCL 40 inch 1080p.. very nice tv. great value
Reviews.Author: tvdad
Reviews.Content: Hello all. I have only had it a day, but I read some DOA reviews on here so I was nervous... Happy to report tv was easy to set up and I couldn't be happier with the picture... go for it!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good TV, Great Price, not compatable with Direct TV Remote
Reviews.Author: Holly
Reviews.Content: I like everything about the TV except that the TCL brand is not listed on the Direct TV remote so we can't sync the remote with the TV.

Reviews.Title: good quality for the price
Reviews.Author: Mon
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV as a replacement. It has a good picture and great sound for the price. Would definitely buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Best chance I ever took.
Reviews.Author: K-Vegas
Reviews.Content: I took a chance on this TV for three reasons:  1) I only needed a basic HDTV for my bedroom, 2) the high reviews this TV has received, and 3)PRICE!I'm sure if I had this TV on a wall beside of higher priced well known brands I would be able to tell a difference between them, but after hooking this bad boy up to my DirecTV system I swear it looks just as good as the Samsung I have in my den and the Vizio I have in my bonus room........for half the price!  No bells and whistles, this is just a hands down basic HDTV with a great picture.  I'm glad I took the chance, it paid off.

Reviews.Title: works well!
Reviews.Author: Sleepier
Reviews.Content: I read some bad reviews...but it is pretty good...Amazon was a gem and I got my order on time as promised...picture quality is good and it looks great in my living room.

Reviews.Title: Great deal on an LCD TV for the casual viewer
Reviews.Author: Jess Hanna
Reviews.Content: For the price, this cannot be beat. I have owned this for a month and am extremely happy because it meets my needs. I just wanted a TV to be able to watch stuff on. For that, it is perfect. It you want all the bells and whistles, buy another TV. If you want a decent TV for a great price (when on sale), buy this one. If you have Wii, Roku, or a PS3, you can then get Netflix, Hulu, etc.I recommend using HDMI connection to get highest resolution. No HDTV can perfectly render standard definition media, but some are able to do it better than this one. I don't find it distracting.6-5-12Sound, but no picture. Contacted TCL, who referred me to warranty service center. I just tossed the box a month earlier, so I have to wait for a box. At least I don't have to pay to ship it? (Looking for a silver lining)6-19-12Received box over two weeks later (somehow missed FedEx on 6-15..) TV is packed up and heading to the warranty service center. This is the third week that I have been without a TV.6-26-12TV has been repaired (bad LCD panel), and is being shipped back.Observations so far: Had to follow up with the warranty service center every step of the way. They do not issue updates on the progress which would help to prevent phone calls and reduce customer frustration.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Satisfied
Reviews.Author: John Tippins
Reviews.Content: I love this TV!  Along with the $25 Cheetah Mount the price can't be beat!  So far I've only used it to play my Wii and watch a few movies on Netflix but the picture quality is amazing as well as super simple to mount!  If I had one complaint, mind you someone would have to force me to complain, I would say that the bezel could stand to be a bit smaller and possibly made of glass and not plastic.  It doesn't look cheap by any standards but it could look more spendy.  However its still aesthetically pleasing.  One thing I love in particular is the remote.  Its super simple to switch back and forth between the different inputs - hassle free!  I don't know what the other reviewers were saying about the things that went wrong.  Possibly defective product?  With Amazon its easy to return and get a replacement so yes it would be a disappointment but not the end of the world!  The LCD panel itself is made by Samsung so it would appear that the rest of the components are made by TCL.  Even so, I've done my research and this was the best selling TV of 2011!  And its no wonder as to why!  When I tell my friends how much I paid for the whole getup they're all dumbfounded and I've had a few go out and buy the same setup and for under $400 for everything, why not!?

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy!
Reviews.Author: dborgaro
Reviews.Content: This TV is an excellent buy for the money. The sound is good, picture in HD is fabulous, plus it comes with a two year warranty. This review was written two months after purchase.

Reviews.Title: Stop working after 1 day!
Reviews.Author: Kenny Ng
Reviews.Content: The price is too good to be true...TV fail to power on after 1 day.  Lucky for free shipping return.  I guess we are not that lucky.

Reviews.Title: awesome deal!
Reviews.Author: SarahVahn
Reviews.Content: I have to say this is a great deal for a quality Tv. Clear picture, great sound, I'm just real pleased! Set up easy about 15 min after opening the box i was watching a blue ray. c:

Reviews.Title: Cost great
Reviews.Author: Leonard Podgorski
Reviews.Content: I check the reviews before I purchased this TV as well as stores.  For the price I am pleased so far.  It's only been a month.  The picture is good as well as the sound.  I had no problem attaching the surround sound to it.

Reviews.Title: I am blown away by this TV!!!!
Reviews.Author: Ehiss
Reviews.Content: I have to admit I was a little uneasy about paying for an off-brand TV, but once it arrived, I was very happy! Having Amazon Prime brought the TV to my door within two days, tops.  My biggest fear was that the TV wouldn't turn on or there would be deal pixels, but once I turned it on, it was perfect.  As others have said, you can see the Samsung name on the panel by using a flashlight.  I have to say, I have a Samsung LCD and the TCL's picture is pretty much the same.  I have a PS3 connected to the TV and the games and Blu-Ray look amazing!  And to top it all off, a two year warranty.  This might be the best kept secret on Amazon, but I would recommend this TV to anyone with a lighter budget looking for a great LCD TV.

Reviews.Title: A little disappointed
Reviews.Author: inboxutah
Reviews.Content: I purchased my T.V. just after Christmas for a great price and it shipped fast without any damage.  Picture is beautiful.  I noticed right off that it takes a minute to come on with the picture.  Suddenly it has began to just shut itself off once and awhile not often but when it does it will not power back on for at least 5 minutes or longer.  Not happy about that and it concerns me that it will continue to get worse until I must have it sent off to be repaired for a duration of time and costs.  Why are electronics such a piece of crap these days? Ugh

Reviews.Title: 40" of pure bliss
Reviews.Author: Ziggy
Reviews.Content: The TCL TV works great! Wonderful picture, and quick response time. Fast delivery also. You don't have to pay more to get a great TV, when you go with TCL.

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: I ordered the 40" TCL L40FHDF12TA 40-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LCD HDTV with 2-Year Warranty,  and was really excited to get it. But when I took it out of the box and hooked it up (per directions) the darn TV wouldn't power up!  Nothing. Not even a bleep.  A little blue light appeared and that was the only sign of life.  Needless to say, I was disappointed.First of all, it was obvious that the TV had been previously used.  There were fingerprints on the remote, scratches on the stand and the screen. The power cord was not wrapped.  It was obvious that it had been bought and returned before.  Does this merchant just blindly restock their inventory?  It's quite interesting ... all of the one star reviews for this product said that the TV had no power...only a little blue light.  Same here....but I was willing to take the risk because there were more 4 and 5 stars. Perhaps they just keep recycling the same no power TV?Anyway, I immediately filed a return.  They are supposed to pick it up tomorrow and I'm supposed to have a replacement by Saturday.  Let's see how this one works....or if it does.  I'll be back to post an update.---------------===============UPDATE: Received the new TV today (shipping was so fast -- 1 day) UPS brought the new one; took the defective one.  Hooked it up - no problems so far.  Beautiful picture. Great features. Will post again if there are any problems.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screent TV, so I don't have much to compare it with other than the TV's I've seen in other peoples' homes and at the store.  Nonetheless, this TV is fantastic.  The picture is great, sounds is good, and setup was a breeze.  I also love the 2-year warranty.

Reviews.Title: If you are a first time HD buyer you will be amazed....
Reviews.Author: dondidit
Reviews.Content: I was very leery about buying a off brand TV but figured for the price you can't go wrong.  My 55" Samsung DLP would've cost over $500 to replace and with 720p technology I figured it wasn't worth the money to replace it.  After researching various brands online and in stores I decided I didn't want to plunk down over $500 dollars for a comparable "name brand" model with the same specs.  I am extremely happy I purchased this product.  The two year warranty really sold me on this product though.  The picture quality is pretty good but wont blow you off your feet.  You will need to adjust the heck out of it to get the right quality for your viewing pleasure so take your time with this part.  The sound quality is not the best but I have a Vizio 47" LCD 1080P in my living area and that sound quality is not the best either.  However, I decided to put this TV on the wall and it made a heck of a difference as the speakers are on the bottom front of the TV. Therefore, the sounds "bounces" off the wall. Much better than on the stand.  Amazon Prime allowed me to receive the TV in two days which I truly appreciated.  If you are a previous HD owner you will be pretty happy but not as happy as someone who never has owned one before if that makes sense.
