First time buyers will be AMAZED but previous HD TV owners will do A LOT of adjusting to get just the right picture.  The cost value if worth it though.  I paid $299 with no tax or shipping.  How can you go wrong right?! You can't beat the price and if it doesn't last past the 2 years you still received the bang for your buck.  FYI, the remote code for DIRECTV will be listed under the RCA as TCL is not listed in names of TVs. Hope this help someone and if you do buy I'm sure you be pleased.  Good luck

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased with TCL L40FHDF12TA  40-inch
Reviews.Author: Dawaka
Reviews.Content: After reading all the reviews I ordered my TCL-40 inch in Febuary 2012. Right out of the the box no problems. Very pleased with picture and sound. I highly recommend this TV. I would buy another in a minute. You can not beat the price! One year and 5 months later TV is still working great with great picture and no problems.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to say that thus far, after having the TV for about a week everything works perfectly. I have a computer, blu ray player and xbox 360 all hooked up through the three hdmi and plugged in an old ps2 into the analog plugins just to make sure everything worked. Once again very pleased. Makes an excellent computer monitor as well, crystal clear picture.

Reviews.Title: Better in home reception
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel
Reviews.Content: This TV is perfect for people who want a larger viewing area, but do not have the room for a 60". I have been using this TV on my Xbox 360 for two weeks now, and have had absolutely no issues with picture quality. Standard definition does suffer from some pixelation issues, but Hi-def looks great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Jessloveslux
Reviews.Content: I have only had this TV for a day so it is hard to tell if it will last, BUT so far,  this TV is awesome!!! I have been looking for months for the best prices & finally decided upon this one. The brand is a name I don't recognize but looks just as nice as some of the bigger brand names. I love that this TV has a 2 year warranty! Overall, so glad I made this purchase! This is my first flat screen so I am in heaven right now! I even got free two day shipping to my house, which is incredible for a 40" TV!! So content with my new TV!!!

Reviews.Title: Good Price, Decent T.V
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: The price of this is very good. I have no qualms about that at all. I really enjoy how the T.V looks. It has good imaging and such. The only downfall is that it doesn't have full 16:9 ratio. Every channel or movie or game that uses this ratio is distorted or leaves about 2" black bars at the top and bottom. That is the only downfall.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected.
Reviews.Author: uniontownship
Reviews.Content: After much research and reading the reviews, we purchased this TV. It was no doubt the best decision we made. The clarity of the colors, minimal pixels (depends on the channel), there is absolutely NO glare, and the sound is wonderful too. We can't really say enough about this tv. Thanks to all of those who assisted in this decision by posting your reviews.

Reviews.Title: no problems
Reviews.Author: lbshutes
Reviews.Content: I've had this Tv for about 2 months and no problems so far. Amazing price. Everything in description appears to be correct from what I've seen.

Reviews.Title: Can't Complain, Good TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Gold Fish Lung
Reviews.Content: I really wasn't expecting such quality from a TV at this price point.  I've lived with the TV for a week and it's been great so far.  I am using this as my primary TV.PICTURE QUALITY:At $350+tax+free prime shipping, I cannot complain at all.  1080i from my cable tv looks good, everything is bright and vibrant.  Just be sure to turn it off eco mode, which detects the light in the room and dims the backlighting (can be quite annoying and useless).  1080p from my xbox and computer looks even better.  At 60hz refresh rate, you will not get that life-like frame rates from your blu-rays.  One issue with the picture is glare.  Dark scenes will catch a lot of glare if you have a lot of windows or lights.  My next TV, i will definitely watch for this.  There is some cropping on the sides, not too bad, i find using "NO OVERSCAN" works best for most situations.SOUND QUALITY:Not great, but you can live with it.  I purchased a pyle mini amp from amazon to power some old bookshelf speakers.  Plugged it into the audio out with the rca cable, and the sound is great.  However, you cannot control the volume of the rca sound output from the tv's volume, you have to use the amp's volume controller.  Slightly inconvenient, but if you hook up a receiver, you might have a remote to control the volume.  Doesn't bother me for the price i paid.ON/OFF:Takes approximately 15 seconds to boot on and off.PICTURE SETTINGS:Does not save picture settings across different inputs, at least not for HDMI.TV STAND:Wobbles, and is not even.  A pain to screw on.RESPONSIVENESS:Pretty responsive in terms of remote input.  I know this may not be the case for other low end TVs.ISSUES:Did not output sound when i hooked up HDMI #2 to PC from the RCA out, but it worked when i hooked it up to HDMI #1, and HDMI #2 with my tv works with RCA out.  Not sure why that happened.LONGEVITY:My biggest concern is will this TV last me?  I am well aware that this TV comes with a two year warranty, but would it be worth the hassle to get it fixed?  I am hoping i don't have any issues with it, but if i do, i will definitely update this review.

Reviews.Title: Quality HDTV
Reviews.Author: Zachary
Reviews.Content: Fills up my bedroom quite nicely. Sound is decent for this price range. A bargain. I will definitely be shopping TCL in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great Value - Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Wade B
Reviews.Content: I had some reservations about buying a "TCL" brand I had never heard of, but I read the reviews and adjusted decided to go with it.  I set the picture as suggested in the reviews and used the Comcast remote code provided by a reviewer.  Everything worked great.  Very good picture and decent sound.  Getting a 40" 1080P HDTV for $319 works for me (even though I saw in the reviews that others had bought this model for as little at $249).  Now we will see how well it hold up...

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: NL "norenie"
Reviews.Content: Never heard of TCL so I looked it up.  6th largest TV manufacturer in China. Hmmm, how bad could it be?  Price was excellent ($150 less than LG I was considering), came with a 2 yr. warranty & shipping costs were included - figured I would give it a try.  What did I have to lose?  Apparently nothing because it is a great TV.  Got it in early January & set it up immediately.  Excellent picture & sound quality, easy to set up (even arrived 2 days earlier than expected), easy on the eyes.  Very pleased - I liked it so much that I bought a total of 3!  My only issue is that sometimes my FIOS remote won't adjust volume - & that is a FIOS problem, not a TV problem. When that happens, I just use the TV remote - problem solved!Would I recommend it to a friend?  Definitely (already have!)!!  Would I buy a TCL TV again?  Definitely!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV/almost as good as Amazon's service
Reviews.Author: JERICO1945
Reviews.Content: The price was great, just like the TV! We just had directv install HD WHAT A PICTURE! This was a replacement to the original one we recvd! The base on the original was all scratched up.  The replacement was sent the day I emailed Amazon, to my amazement I recvd it the next day. Thank's Amazon

Reviews.Title: Great Item at an Amazing Price!!!
Reviews.Author: DWILLZ
Reviews.Content: this is an amazing item for the price!!!!i got this item for $277. Plus  i also got free next day shipping!!! When i got the tv i was hoping it was as big as it was described and it was!! This tv is great!! It has really good quality. One thing that i notice though is that when its hooked up to like basic cable it doesn't show up as clear. I live on a college campus so you know you dont get the best cable. Overall it shows pretty great. I would recommend digital cable though because you get a box with all the HD inputs and outputs and it shows up really clear. Also one of the things i was hearing was dead pixels that people were getting when they bought there tv. I did have one on mines but it is barely noticeable unless you have the tv on showing a black screen but other then that you cant tell. One thing that i liked about this tv besides the price is the HDMI. I like to watch my videos from my computer or my camera on the tv. I have a professional studio camera and it looks amazing on this tv. the quality is so clear even when im watching youtube videos from my computer on the tv. Its also good for playing your pc games on the tv as if it were an xbox or playstation. The sound and picture is amazing on here. it has all the ports to connect any computer and pretty much and device. it evens has USB which allows you to play music straight from a usb drive. all you do is plug the USB in and go to media, then it reads the USB and plays the music. also it lets you play photos from there as well. My sister and her husband bought a 46 inch tv from walmart for almost $600. it has the sames features it just cost way more. This is a good buy...plus you get a 2 year warranty so you cant beat that. Also its so cheap that i think this item has a high resale value. So i think if you buy it and decide to sell it you can easily make your money back or possibly make more. I could easily flip this tv for $350-$400 when i only paid $277 plus free next day shipping. Overall its just a great item and  i would recommend it over going to walmart or any other place!!!

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV for the price...Better than most high end brands
Reviews.Author: GB999
Reviews.Content: Great picture, with an  HD source you can not tell the difference from brands that cost three times as much....Great buy.. would buy again, and has a 2 year warranty.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: mess sgt.
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my TV good picture and sound. No problems as in other previous reviews by others. Would rate as 5 stars

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: J. Hable "Road Trip"
Reviews.Content: Just a short review about this HDTV. I was looking for a basic television to replace the tube TV in my living room and this one fit perfectly. It's not a top-of-the-line set, but definetely great quality for the price. Besides the quality and price, I had read other reviews on this TV before buying and read that it apparently has a Samsung LCD screen. I'm not sure if this matters to you, but I'm a bit Samsung biased. I tend to drift towards Samsung screens. Well anyways, great replacement for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: reaper4824
Reviews.Content: Excellent prodtuct. I bought one liked it so well I bought 2 more. Kids love them in their bedrooms and are great looking while watching tv or playing ps3 or xbox. Bonus two year warranty instead of one like most others. The best David from Bolivar Mo

Reviews.Title: Great First HD LCD TV
Reviews.Author: SKRIBZ 20
Reviews.Content: I love this tv ! 5 STARS !!! <33 The Tv was well packed, the package was huge, and when I first opened it. I was like YAYAHHH I got my first HD TV :D This is a great buy!Only thing is that cable remotes or universal remotes do not work on it, but what the hell... Who cares. Just reach over for the TV remote and enjoy. <3

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great price.
Reviews.Author: Erica
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV so far. Inexpensive, clear picture, decent sound. It took me MONTHS to finally settle on this TV, and I'm glad I did.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann Mckanna-popek "Moon"
Reviews.Content: what a great buy.Terrific picture, sound, altogether pleased.Had it here in 3 days.I amy not be some techy looking for a TV that does every thing, but for the family room I think I got a good product

Reviews.Title: It's a steal!
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: Just got it today, plug n play, everything's fantastic! bought it at 330, knew it has been lower, but given the price matching policy and the great comment history of this product, it's not going to drop any howso after a quick research on Bestbuy and in local Walmart, i purchased online with no hesitation.The reason that makes the decision easy is, i know the brand TCL. I'm from China and i know it's great domestic brand there, obviously not as good as SONY, Panasonic or maybe SHARP here and there, it's for sure better than Dynex or whatever sold cheap here that is nothing in US or China. So if ur not considering high-end TVs as those three and choosing Made-In-China, choose some brand that is trusted there and those trying to build their name here in US.Back to the TV, starting is slow as commented before, but not as long as 15 sec i think. Menu is nothing fancy and straightforward,tied HDMI from my laptop and it's fluent. Cable not ready yet so unable to test with ESPN HD.One more thing, i failed to find the energy info prior to purchase, and it's on the label of the real thing so it's better to share it now: "$23 based on  11 cents per kWh and 5 hours use per day"Overall a steal to own a '40 1080P TV with 330

Reviews.Title: Non Technical Person. Love It
Reviews.Author: B. zuniga "b012"
Reviews.Content: This is our first flat screen LCD. We came from a 9 year old Box TV.So take it for what it is worth. We checked around and this is the best TV for the priceThe shipping was 1 week. Everything came in orderVery easy set up. Took me 10 minutes.Picture Quality is great for DVD. And love it to use the computer for.No pixel problems and sounds is good.For the nerd gamers not sure if this would be the best.But if you are looking for an upgrade from box tv or need an extra TV for another room this one is perfect.First week of use. Will be back for update in a month

Reviews.Title: Don't spend the extra bucks!
Reviews.Author: majos0407
Reviews.Content: After having it for over two weeks now I would have to say I give it a solid A, not A+ BUT A. There is some quirkiness to it but overall it has as good as picture as my boyfriends parents Bravia PLUS being almost half the price, shall I say more? I will...First off it MINE has a tempered glass stand..why..I have no idea..The one at Big Lots does not...longterm that could be a problem since I will be moving alot...Second...This might not be a problem because my boyfriend said his Dynex 32" did it but for some reason when you turn it on and off the lighting tubes in the TV have a crinkling noise similar to aluminum foil because of heat. Is that Normal..maybe so, so verify with dealers..I have a feeling the cheaper LCD's do that..It never affected the Dynex because that baby was running after four years! Here's a SERIOUS WARNING. Fed Ex left the TV at the door OUTSIDE with NO ONE home..I would highly recommend if you have a house get a hold of Amazon before you order to pay for delconfir(signing). Overall the the TV's pic is AWESOME but the TV's actual appearance is poor..It has for some reason a grey plastic bar covering the lower part which is ugly..and the glass stand does not look good on it. Last years model looks alot better. It basically looks like a factory mish mash..The Samsung rumor(It having a Samsung panel)has not been verified with me BUT it looks as good as ANY TV in the market under $500! Don't hesitate..the two year warranty is just gravy..Understand, only this TV and Insignia are the only ones on the market that do that!

Reviews.Title: great price
Reviews.Author: jiahao
Reviews.Content: this tv doesn't have the best picture and the sound is terrible. but it's only 300 bucks, 40" screen! can't ask for more!

Reviews.Title: failed in 6 weeks
Reviews.Author: Wes Edens
Reviews.Content: About six weeks after we got the TV, it developed a problem not uncommon to LCD televisions, where one color is offset from the others and appears on the screen as a ghost.  In our case, it's bright blue.We're waiting on warranty service now.

Reviews.Title: TCL 40" LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Puglady
Reviews.Content: So far I am pleased with my new 40" LCD tv. The colors are bold and themenu setup is quite easy. For the money this is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: You Get What You Pay For CSR Sucks Update Problem Resolved
Reviews.Author: Brad Anderson
Reviews.Content: Just after I finished this review I received a call frpm Terrence. He said that they had a firmware fix for the slide show problem and that he was emailing it to me. Sure enough the file resolved the issue and was simple to install. I have raised my review to 3 Stars. I probably would have raised it to 4 but I don't know how the unit will hold up and there CSR department is not very fast. However, it does seem like they are tryingNote if the slide show USB feature of this set is important - don't buy it. Doesn't work and their CSR department does not respond to email. They have confirmend that it is a problem they are working on but don't know when it will be resolved. For more info see discussion groups at end of the review section.Bought two of these for spare bedrooms about 30 days ago. One set was dead on arrival so it went back to Amazon for an exchange. The other set worked but had a couple of quirks. The biggest one was the USB port. The set offers to show photos from a USB Memory stick which it does but the system is not very intuitive. The biggest problem is that when in slide show mode there is a banner with the picture description and file information that does not go away. When you bring up a single picture the banner goes away after a few seconds but it will not go away in slideshow mode. It takes up a quarter of the screen and looks ridiculous. I called their Customer service line and they said they had heard about the issue before and asked me if I could send them a photo of the screen with the banner. I did that several weeks ago but have not heard a thing. Dropped the CSR rep an email telling him that I was going to have to return both TV's to Amazon if I didn't hear from him. Still no word so I am going to call once more before sending the TV's back. The picture is acceptable for the price but is not as good as the bigger brand names. I think the CSR department may be in China because of the email address. I wouldn't buy these again. However since I installed two wall mounts I would prefer to keep them but not if they don't have a software fix for the problem.

Reviews.Title: TV Review
Reviews.Author: creneau
Reviews.Content: Well pleased with the sharpness of the picture. Setup instructions were easy to follow. The unit itself is very light when it comes to mounting.

Reviews.Title: Best money I ever spent!
Reviews.Author: terry gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I gotta say this tv really impress me for the money! Not to mention it was even better because I bought mine used for 278.00 shipped to my door! This does broadcast in 1080p only if u have an hd box or some sort of player that plays 1080p. The tv has alot of features. I did program my directv remote code #11447 it worked on the first try. The speakers are ok but they are expected on a flat screen tv. I did paired this tv with a cheetah wall mount for 30 bucks shipped to my door as well. In conclusion, this tv is clear and crisp and is perfect for people who are on a budget and dont believe in brand name. This tv looks FINE IN MY BEDROOM!

Reviews.Title: A+
Reviews.Author: mother mopar
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price!  Had to adjust/tweak the color and sound settings for awhile to get it just right but for under $300 TV its really good.

Reviews.Title: TCL The Best
Reviews.Author: Jplumlee
Reviews.Content: This is my second TCL. Moved up from 32" to 40" for same price. The ability to upgrade firmware by USB, or to fix a problem is an outstanding feature.

Reviews.Title: 40" lcd hdtv
Reviews.Author: jfbjr
Reviews.Content: i found the television to be an excellent buy for the price.  the picture quality and sound is good setup was simple for multiple components

Reviews.Title: 40" TCL LCD
Reviews.Author: Sam Rachiele
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews prior to purchase, most were good some not so good.  I went with the majority which had no problems and I guessed correctly.  I have not had a problem and this picture is fantastic.  I could not find a TV with 1080 and that size for less than 400.00.  This was a great deal, my next door neighbor does soundsystem and theater systems for a living and he thought it was a great deal also.

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: Detlef Alle
Reviews.Content: For now, I can't give it more than one star. And the star really goes to Amazon and it's return policy. The TV was DOA. Makes me wonder if they do any sort of quality assurance at TCL?UPDATE: the replacement TV arrived today. This time, it actually works, however there is a big scratch in the screen.So, I have requested another return. Amazon is not willing to upgrade to one day shipping, even though this is the second defective shipment. Very unsatisfactory. I would rate "0" stars if I could and I will think twice before ordering at Amazon again.UPDATE: the replacement hat arrived and this time it actually works. The picture is awesome and I like the speakers as well. Patience pays.

Reviews.Title: Affordable 40" LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Colette Huebner
Reviews.Content: If this was 120 Hz, that would top it off, but for the price, it's a great TV. It did take a few phone calls to Cable and TCL to get everyting right. So, don't be alarmed, if you plug it in and get a blue screen.  There's plenty of things that need to be tweeked, but when it's all said and done, the TV is great, and the price even better, $319.00 delivered!

Reviews.Title: Picture
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Picture is alright on x box and roku but just regular cable without hdmi you can see the pixelation. It would be a great tv for a "mad cave" or something similar but for your main tv in the living room I do not recommend it.Most likely going to return and order the LG 42LV4400. This tv is great quality for the price just not for your main display.

Reviews.Title: Watch out!
Reviews.Author: adfasfdasfdfaasfs
Reviews.Content: I was very hesitant to order this item after reading all of the negative reviews. I decided that the low price was worth the risk. Well, as soon as I turned on the TV right out of the box, several black lines that ran vertically along the entire length of the screen. Dead pixels just as many of the other reviews had described. I was very upset. I have already printed out the return shipment after 20 minutes of opening my product. I will update when the second TV arrives to let everyone know if it works or not.On the positive side, the TV looks better in person. Very good styling and the silver accent piece is smaller and not as noticeable as I thought it would be. The TV is also very light and the glass stand was very easy to install and looks great.So if you have the patience to wait out a TV that works, I would say this is worth the cheap price.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV for the Price!!
Reviews.Author: she say whaaaat?
Reviews.Content: First things first....Amazon's shipping is amazing.  I did the super saver shipping and it was estimated to take 3 to 5 business days.  Ordered saturday received the next tuesday.The TV has Great Picture and Sound.  For Xbox360 it looks amazing. I have been all about Samsung TV's, but when I found out that the Panel is made my Samsung that is what sold me.  Could not beat the quality and Price for this TV.

Reviews.Title: Loving it so far
Reviews.Author: Erik J Hatcher
Reviews.Content: Got a great deal on this tv and have been loving every minute of it. It was a big step up from what I owned previously, and though I don't know how it compares to other tvs this size, the picture looks excellent to me. Obviously you get out what you put in, and input from an HDMI cable is much better than RCA. The sound is nothing spectacular, but it is more than good enough for my purposes. It was delivered more quickly than expected, and very easy to set up. The stand seems solid, it looks nice, and it has plenty of ports of various types (3 HDMI the most important). So far I'm loving my experience with it.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Sean Kane "Insert Witty Comment"
Reviews.Content: This is a solid tv for the price, but won't cut it if you want a perfect tv. There is a blue tint in the top left corner that you can see if the screen is dark, this doesn't bother me but might bother more easily annoyed people. The only truly disappointing thing I found is that the speakers are pretty bad, with almost no bass, so I would recommend buying speakers with the tv. The good rating is because this was a good $100+ cheaper than the next 40" 1080p tv I could find.

Reviews.Title: Great pic, good quality for the price
Reviews.Author: Kyani C. Tolbert
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these for a Christmas present for my dad and he loved it, so I got one for myself. The picture is great and the stand is very sturdy. I plan on wall mounting it soon though. My only complaint is the buzzing sound produced when you turn the volume up past a certain point thru the television. I just set the volume control to a low level and adjust it through my cable box to get around that issue. Other than that, I am very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding value
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV after watching prices and product for several months. Obviously I was not looking for the latest and greatest product, but a value. This TV delivered just that.If a good picture at a great price is what you are after , this is a great option.Amazon delivery was speedy, ordered after hours on a Friday and had a TV by Wednesday afternoon

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Roger Dodger32
Reviews.Content: I wanted a TV for our kids playroom and this seemed to be a great deal so we went for it. II must admit that this is a very sharp TV with a very good picture. I am happy that this worked out since it is a great price and I do not feel bad if the kids do something to it (lets keep fingers crossed they dont!)

Reviews.Title: Wish I would have bought another
Reviews.Author: jasco
Reviews.Content: For the price of this TV when we bought it, I wish I would have bought another one.  TV image and size is great for playing the ps3 on and the sounds is great too.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy at Good Price
Reviews.Author: mcta1
Reviews.Content: The Quality of this TV is surprising Many Inputs to choose from such as the PC to TV is outstanding. I rate it Over All at 4 and 1/2 Stars.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my wife and received in two days and had it mounted on my bedroom wall and connected within 2 hours. Spent the weekend watching her favorite movies and my sons favorite shows. Connected the TV to my sorround sound. Also connected it to my PC with the VGA cable. Have a hook up to HDMI for my Android. TV is hooked up to regular Antenna. After a weekend of heavy use, I have had no problems. For all those skeptical of non name brand TV,s, this is a great price for a really good TV.

Reviews.Title: More than I expected
Reviews.Author: bschwert
Reviews.Content: First of all this TV arrived long before its assigned delivery date.  Setting up the TV was extremely easy and I have had zero problems with it.  When I tell my friends and family what I paid for this TV they are in shock.  TCL is not a well known brand but the picture quality is fabulous.  I am not the type of person to run all sorts of tests on a TV like some folks but this TV is worth every penny.  Don't pass this offer up.

Reviews.Title: Good user experience for a wallet friendly price
Reviews.Author: Xopher B
Reviews.Content: I was looking to replace a 36 inch CRT eyesore and had this TV suggested by a colleague. While it does not have all of the features of more expensive sets, it is still a solid TV. I looked at the big name brands and the big name prices and it was keeping me out of the LCD market.  The 2 year warranty and free ship/free return sealed the deal. The picture is awesome - more than I could have hoped for. I was originally concerned with glare from my windows or lamps but this is not a problem. The sound is mediocre but so it was with my old TV. Time for a surround sound system to compliment the new TV. We've had the set for a month now and the whole family is still impressed every day. You should be warned though that if you purchase this TV and then tell your friends and family what you paid, they may burst into tears as they tell you how much they spent for their lower quality set!

Reviews.Title: hell yeah! lol
Reviews.Author: Cash661
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV as a replacement for the CRT that was in my bedroom. I was looking for a 32-36 inch range and wanted to spend no more than $400. I have owned it just shy of a month and it has exceeded my expectations. Picture quality is honestly not bad, features are a little lacking but to be expected at this price point, sound is honestly very good, multiple HDMIs. I would tell anyone looking for a second TV or anyone who is just looking to enter the flat screen TV market and not spend a lot of money to check out this TCL!

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Adriano
Reviews.Content: Really, an excellent purchase without any problems! The product is amazing, and was delivered at time. Thanks! If I had to purchase again I would. Best value for the money that I could find.

Reviews.Title: Great TV especially for the money
Reviews.Author: Pam
Reviews.Content: This TV, for the money, does the job.  Great picture clarity.  X-box games are fantastic.  We have in a small room and sound works ok.  If it were hooked up to an external sound system would be even better.  If I had to purchase again I would.  Best value for the money that I could find.

Reviews.Title: The Best 40" TV Deal
Reviews.Author: Jesus Navarrete
Reviews.Content: Excellent items, 319.00 unbeatable cost, it match any need for electronic device, it is been in use in the Stock Market Trading Room 24/7 never stop.

Reviews.Title: Buy It! Stop wasting my time and yours.
Reviews.Author: S. Picchione
Reviews.Content: It's perfect. It has everything you need and more. It's the best picture I've ever seen. The audio is impressively better than other tv's I've bought before. Buy it stop looking now.

Reviews.Title: 40 Inch TLC LCD HDTV with 2 Year Warranty
Reviews.Author: Lennette Meredith
Reviews.Content: I could not have been happier with the purchase of this TCL LCD HDTV.  The picture and sound are very clear.  TCL L40FHDF12TA 40-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LCD HDTV with 2-Year Warranty

Reviews.Title: Very Impressive
Reviews.Author: David Casper
Reviews.Content: This is a great product at a great price. The video looks good. However, I don't use the built-in speakers which are not at all good. I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a good price
Reviews.Author: DougG
Reviews.Content: I was favorably impressed when I set up this TV and found so many more inputs, outputs and features that usually come with much higher priced sets. It works well with my Bang & Olafsen whole-house stereo, the DVD player, viewing free internet movies from my laptop, and with HD satellite service.

Reviews.Title: WHY ARE YOU READING THIS!!!
Reviews.Author: tk-421
Reviews.Content: Buy this tv, you will have no regrets! i was nervous with the idea of shipping a big screen tv via FedEx, the thought of it arriving in a million bits and pieces and with me out of cash was unsettling. but amazons return policy eases the anxiety, and with so many positive reviews i had to give it a shot. The tv showed up unharmed, plugged it in, and was amazed...at how bad analog cable looks. Plugged in the Xbox 360 and the PS3, and wow this tv knocks the socks off in HD. this tv is in my bedroom so the sound is more then acceptable from the speakers. and there is a little bit of light bleed in the top corners but nothing to knock a star off for. gaming is a dream. my room mate just spent 600 on a toshiba 42in and the colors on that look more faded and washed out then this screen, shes jealous. ok im done typing, go buy it, i need to get back to my tv.

Reviews.Title: TCL 40 inch
Reviews.Author: Richard J. Nimer
Reviews.Content: For the price this is an excellent TV and outstanding value. The picture is excellent and I doubt you can find a better deal anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the money!
Reviews.Author: William Riley "Patrick"
Reviews.Content: Exactly as described. Base was quick to add; TV was operable in 5 minutes Great budget television; perfect for the kids. Nice size for a child's room as well.

Reviews.Title: so far, so good
Reviews.Author: Dr. Leibnitz
Reviews.Content: Bought the TV based on the all reviews here. The alternative was going to be a 32in Panasonic, for the same price. So far, I'm pleasantly surprised. The TV came nicely packed, no issues there. It's very light, I was able to carry it upstairs by myself. The picture quality is pretty good, the sound is a bit weak but whatever, it's a small TV.No regrets.

Reviews.Title: TCL 40" LCD
Reviews.Author: Kirk Chwialkowski
Reviews.Content: My daughter needed a TV for her sitting room and this size was perfect. With the price AMAZON gave, which also included a two year warranty, you couldn't beat it! As far as I am concerned, the picture and sound are fine. This is not a high end unit so I am not expecting to be dazzled with all sorts of "options" and just wanted a basic TV. The sound is good and I found on this rating blog a tech that actually gives the best EQ & picture settings for both which I plugged in. AMAZON does it once again! Thanks AMAZON :-)

Reviews.Title: Great bagain
Reviews.Author: J. Lane
Reviews.Content: I bought this when it was on sale back in December.  I wanted to wait a couple months to make sure there were no issues and we have yet to have any.  The picture is above average to my eyes, the sound is good for the price.  We don't watch much TV, so this fits us perfectly.  We got it for a great price and I would definitely recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Sweet Television
Reviews.Author: DJG "DJG"
Reviews.Content: Awesome television for the price. Great picture and for someone like a college student who is on a tight budget this is the TV for you. Very pleased and nice warranty.

Reviews.Title: Love my new HDTV!!
Reviews.Author: Jean in Cocoa
Reviews.Content: My new TCL HD TV was received in the time frame that it was promised and in perfect condition.  Thanks Amazon, again it was a pleasure to purchase from you.

Reviews.Title: A real bargain
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: When I perused the reviews of this TV prior to purchase, I noticed that the only negative reviews involved the fact that it is Chinese made and did not address its performance. I decided to take a risk because of its very low price and so far I'm very happy with my decision. The picture quality is great and only time will tell if it has the reliability I'd like to see.

Reviews.Title: A very good TV
Reviews.Author: Roger
Reviews.Content: I bought this TCL L40FHDF12TA 40-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LCD HDTV  in Jan and it is very good in picture and sound system. I like it very much.

Reviews.Title: Amazing price for an amazing product!
Reviews.Author: Sydney Milligan
Reviews.Content: I definitely am a bargain shopper and I did a lot of research before I bought this tv. It was the best decision! Great color, sound and quality. I would recommend to anyone to buy this tv ASAP!

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Leckie Gunter
Reviews.Content: I'm a college student, so I really don't need that big of a TV. I found that the 40in was just right. This TV is good for what you are paying... in fact, excellent for what you are paying and I would recommend it with these details.Pros: cost, very light weight (compared to plasma) and therefor portable (good for college student)Cons: the sound is definitely not its strong point. I found that it sounded muffled and could notice that it was coming from the back of the TV. but this isn't really an issue since I just pulled out my speakers and pump it through that.... but seriously, if you don't have speakers or a surround sound to go with, invest in some or else you will notice the muffled sound

Reviews.Title: Happy as a Clam
Reviews.Author: Zygmunt
Reviews.Content: After looking at all of our choices, we found the 40" TCL to beat all it's competitors. 1080p was a plus! 60Hz was definitely on the low side; however, we don't do much gaming so I'm hoping it won't affect us too much. Coming from a 15" TV in our bedroom, this 40" is awe-inducing. The majority of reviews we read were positive for this no-name. Free two day shipping put another smile on our faces and I'm sitting here on front of a glowing 40" screen after a 15 minute set-up (that included moving two dressers). I left a little plastic on the screen for my girlfriend to pull of when she gets home. If you decide to buy I hope your transaction goes just a smoothly and makes you just as happy. I will update if any problems occur. I have only had the TV for 45 minutes.UPDATE: I have Comcast and didn't want to use two remotes. I had to reprogram my little black Digital Adapter Remote using the code "10047". Comcast doesn't have any specific codes for TCL TVs. The code for RCA ended up working. Hold Set button until it blinks twice. Let go of Set button and press "1-0-0-4-7". Press the power to check if Set was made.

Reviews.Title: Sucks for gamers, great for everybody else
Reviews.Author: Mukul
Reviews.Content: There is micro-lag where the video plays about a half second or so after the sound.For gamers: If you play anything like online shooters, racing, etc that requires precise timing, this TV is NOT for you. There's no way(believe me I've tried- vga cables, trying to turn off all effects, you name it) to get rid of the video lag. It's about a half second or so, which is a lifetime in serious gaming. Single player RPG's or adventure games are not as badly affected, although expect to be disconcerted when the characters' mouths move out of sync with the voices, worse on some games, better on others.For everybody else: Great tv for the price($320) for all uses besides gaming.Lastly, the tv does take a while to power up fully, not instant or even close. Takes over 15 seconds just to "boot". Not a big deal if you're a patient person but could drive some people crazy.Side note: The digital sound output is coaxial, not TOSLINK.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: SameOldStory
Reviews.Content: UPDATE 6/3/12When I bought this it was $320. Apparently it's been decided that it's worth an additional $120.Although I like it a lot, at the higher price I may not have bought it.Still good, but.....-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------I bought this for a valentine's day's gift & my wife loves it.The screen is clear & sharp. The color is great. Sound is better than the large tube TV that we just got rid of.If anyone has a problem with the sound then just add a separate sound system, this HDTV is large enough to justify it.As some mentioned there is a *faint* light bleed thru in the upper left corner.This can ONLY be noticed when the top part of the screen is very dark or black.But YOU HAVE TO LOOK FOR IT. Strangely enough I don't recall many movie producers that pack a lot of action up in the corners.No stuck pixels.The remote IS a little touchy. Button presses have to be quick. Hit a 4 and if it isn't fast you get 44. But you're probably going to use the cable remote most of the time anyway, right?Other than that very minor problem, I have NO complaints.This is a nice HDTV at a very low cost. If you want *a little* more in the way of features go ahead and spend $200-$300 more for another TV. But my wife loves it, and I'm more than happy with it.DEFINITELY A GOOD BUY!Just a note on some of the complaints about the color - While changing channels my wife came to a station showing pictures of the Obamas. In one picture he was grayish looking. In another he was pinkish. In still another he was light brown. And in another he was slightly darker. This was all within one TV show! How can anyone complain that the color is bad on the TV when the source is so varied?

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: zayex
Reviews.Content: Awesome product! no complaints at all, buy one. Dimensions are 24.5 by 38.5 inches, great picture. I might buy another one. The Superbowl looked amazing. I think if I paid 600 bucks for it I would give it 5 stars, plus the fact that it was half that.. so I'm going to step out and give it 6 stars...I heard some people had some power-down problems, but the one I got doesn't do that...Buy one!Remote codes are 503, 641, and 651.503 worked with my Dish Network remote.

Reviews.Title: Deal and a Half
Reviews.Author: Tim Brown
Reviews.Content: This is a quality tv for the price. Minimal assembly, and it looks great. Got this to hook up to my mac book pro and it is crisp and clean with a bit of changes to the display settings.

Reviews.Title: Amazed
Reviews.Author: sheikh
Reviews.Content: Ordered it from Amazon for about $330, got here the second day. Set it up in my room, the picture quality is amazing and the sound is very acceptable. Definitely worth the money, although it does tend to get dirty but that's not an issue. Overall, beautiful product very pleased, and the two-year warranty makes it even better.

Reviews.Title: Another Remote Code
Reviews.Author: Middle Man
Reviews.Content: After using some remote codes listed on the internet, we used a RCA remote code did not properly address the adjustment of the volume.  When you wanted to adjust the volume, you never knew where to point it.  Our TV provider uses a set-top box with a Titan universal remote.  Tiring of the volume action or lack of it, I finally I did a search for the code.  The procedure required a step by step advancement of each code until the TV shut off.  About every second I pressed the button then after 2 1/2 commercials, it shut off.  The code was 12434.  Try it.  It works great for us.

Reviews.Title: TCL L40FHDF12TA 40-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LCD HDTV with 2-Year Warranty
Reviews.Author: nitrojinxer
Reviews.Content: I received my 40" TCL 1080p HDTV from Amazon last Saturday. It was shipped via FedEx and I was a bit worried about it being in one piece. The carton had a big hole in it, but after unpacking the set and hooking it up to my computer I found that all was well. This is by far the best value for the money, as the colors and vibrant picture quality go hand in hand to give a clearer than clear awesome rendering of flight simulation, and train simulation. Because I am an old gamer, these things really do matter.

Reviews.Title: Had to return twice
Reviews.Author: Marcia Simons
Reviews.Content: I had to return this TV twice for the same reason - it wouldn't turn on.  The first time a blue light in the bottom left hand corner came on, the second time there was no blue light but the unit would not power up.  I couldn't believe I had the same issue twice.  I decided not to try a third time since it really is a pain repacking and dragging the box to UPS.  I returned both units and asked for a refund which I received quickly.

Reviews.Title: Hurry up!
Reviews.Author: MONAMAZON
Reviews.Content: Its my first amazon product review. I am plenty pleased with my purchase. I was looking to buy a TV when I came across this one. Well, this isnt a famous brand in US but it is well known in other countries. I am from India so I have heard this brand plenty of times. Guys, this company has 50,000 employees and have good R&D; section.Size: I was going to buy an LED 32inch monitor but preferred this one. You cant get a better deal than this. It has VGA, 3HDMI, USB thats all I needed. So you are basically getting a HDTV 1080p at monitors price.I use it with my laptop as an external display. satisfied  I would say.BUY IT!

Reviews.Title: The best deal I have ever got
Reviews.Author: Supriya Abhyankar
Reviews.Content: I really liked this new TV, Its perfect. best price and best results...Do not think twice..just buy it. I had used same brand TV in other country but here its not a popular brand. I loved my Tv back home so thought of buying the same here and it was so much cheaper compared to other brand. It is the best experience.

Reviews.Title: Great TV! Love AMAZON!!
Reviews.Author: Zarp
Reviews.Content: First off, I purchased this TV on Monday night, chose the free shipping option, and received it Wednesday night!  So hats off to Amazon for their quick turnaround!As for the TV itself.  I had read most of the reviews and had braced myself for a potential issue with the TV once received.  But so far, it has been AWESOME!  This was my first TV over 32inches, and it has been a great buy!  I have compared the picture quality with those of major brand names, and to me I do not see much of a difference.  And the sound is just fine, it is sitting in my bedroom and we have the volume sitting between 12-20, and it is more than enough.To top it off, it has a 2-year warranty!  Most TV's that I've looked at have a 90-day warranty, and at best a 1-year warranty.  Even if the TV starts having problems, with a 2-year warranty, you can't beat it!I will be recommending this TV to all my family and friends, specially at the prices offered by Amazon!

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: RGC
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv a few weeks ago and so far it is perfect.  Easy to set up and good picture quality - although I have to admit I am not too picky.  Loved the price and happy with the tv!

Reviews.Title: docray
Reviews.Author: DIYDOC "DIYDOC"
Reviews.Content: Arrived in ONE day-easy assembly and install --excellent picture AS DESCRIBED BY OTHERS BAD AUDIO --but for the price not worthy of complaint Keep in mind for the price of other sets you can have (2) two and then the warranty  of (2) years--- Unbeatible Value So it's Chinese --it's not different than much of all our foriegn electonics

Reviews.Title: confused
Reviews.Author: John H.
Reviews.Content: When I read reviews on this the other day I thought there were 72-one star ratings.  Now there are 30.  I'm pretty sure it's the same model.  odd...

Reviews.Title: reasonable price for a 40 inch tv
Reviews.Author: LARIMARI
Reviews.Content: i bought this 40 inch tv for our small living room. the picture and sound quality is excellent. i have no complaints so far . good buy at amazon!!! Brand : TCL L40 FHD 12Ta-40 in 1080p 60 hz LCD HDTV with 2 yr warranty and free shipping. Even Walmart can not compete with this deal!!!  sad to say !! only Amazon!!!!

Reviews.Title: A Review of the TCL L40FHDF12TA 40-Inch HD TV
Reviews.Author: Clay Welsh "welshc"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV about a month ago based on its price and the reviews seen on Amazon.com. After watching this TV for over 4 weeks, I can tell you that it is a beautiful and very functional television set. The color is fantastic and the sound quality is excellent. The only real negative I have is its blue light on the front that indicates the tv is on. It's impossible to see from the right side of the tv and when you turn the set on, it takes a few seconds before the logo is visible. It would be nice if the power indicator was more visible. All in all, it's a great tv for $318. Besides that, you can't beat Amazon's FREE SHIPPING.

Reviews.Title: 40" tv
Reviews.Author: jhuov
Reviews.Content: super fast delivery. box arrived in good shape and the tv was well packaged. easy to set up and have not had any problems a month into using. the base looked to be of a good quality but I wall mounted the tv. hd is a must as with standard cable the picture looked ok from 8' and more but really looks good with a hd or converted signal.

Reviews.Title: Just got my tv, first day
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: well packaged fast shipping, 3 hdmi ports, 3.5mm in and out, pc port, 2 av (rca), 2 componant ports. 5  point equalizer, fully costumizable picture, seprate audio control between tv and sound system ( sold sepratly ), quick assembly. WOW. if it goes up will reveiw again

Reviews.Title: TCL 40" TV
Reviews.Author: Deanna S
Reviews.Content: This TCL 40" TV was bought for hubby at Christmas and so far has worked great. Picture is bright and clear and we are TiCkLed having this big screen in our bedroom! It was delivered on time (Prime two day) even though it was only a few days before Christmas and I like that it has a two year warranty. So far works perfectly and the price was great.

Reviews.Title: TCL = awesome bargain!
Reviews.Author: M. Balut
Reviews.Content: This TV, even at 329 is an awesome deal.  It has a Samsung panel, so the picture is fantastic!  I am using this as a monitor via HDMI, text is clear, looks awesome.  Don't hesitate to pick up this TV.  This is the mount I bought, which is also at steal at roughly $30 :AVF EL404B-A Multi Position Dual Arm TV Mount for 25-Inch to 40-Inch Screens (Black)

Reviews.Title: Amazon's Hidden Treasure!
Reviews.Author: Super.Max
Reviews.Content: I was fortunate to purchase this tv for $319.99 - missed the holiday specials. However, I am very pleased with this tv and even like more than the 32" Vizio w/internet that I purchased last year. While this tv does not have the internet feature, the picture is crisp, and does not disappoint. I know it is hard to purchase a tv sight unseen but believe me, you will not regret it. I am planning to purchase one more for the house.Also, the size is perfect. I really thought I wanted a 42" or 46" but again, this tv does not disappoint and neither does Amazon.

Reviews.Title: TCL 40" TV
Reviews.Author: Juanitod
Reviews.Content: Thanks for this product at such a reduced price.  I had to download & install a small update, but afterwards, the issue of the TV turning-off prematurely vanished - Jr.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING QUALITY/FANTASTIC PRICE
Reviews.Author: LLWZ
Reviews.Content: This is the second TCL tv I've purchased for our home.  I really didn't "need" to get a new tv and I didn't want to spend a lot of money...then this 40" TCL went on sale.  We already have 32" TCL in the loft upstairs, used for video games.  I purchased that one a year ago - Christmas...it's still working fantastic (my son LOVES IT)..so I felt I couldn't go wrong with this 40" at the amazing sale price.  It arrived ONE day after I placed my order. The UPS guy said "this must be a good tv....it's the 4th one I've delivered today"!  Lightweight, GREAT picture!  The only "negative" thing I can say is that the  wide side-angle view isn't that great.  However, being SO lightweight, I just turned it slightly so we can see it better from our kitchen - and the picture is perfect!  The HD picture is crystal clear...wow, what a difference from the old Sony!  I couldn't ask for better quality for the price. I think TCL is a hidden treasure.VERY HAPPY WITH THE PURCHASE!!!  Thanks AMAZON for sending me the email notice that this tv was on sale! :)  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Enjoying the tv
Reviews.Author: NEGirl
Reviews.Content: My first flat screen tv, and I love it! There are some times where the picture can be somewhat dark, but I think it just takes some extra tweaking. Other than that, the only problem I had was setting it up, because the first time I put the stand on backwards. LOL

Reviews.Title: Hard to attach base, not necessarily a bad thing.
Reviews.Author: Onashu
Reviews.Content: I've only had this tv for a month or so, but I have not run into any major issues with it.  When first attaching the base, it was difficult to get the screws in tightly, but that also means that the base is connected very securely once they are tightened properly.  I mainly use it for PC gaming, and occasionally hook it up to my XBOX, and the picture is very nice quality.  I got it for $320 at the time, so it was a great deal!

Reviews.Title: Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Whaley
Reviews.Content: Haven't had the TV long and it's a bedroom TV so it doesn't see a lot of use, but the picture is great and the price was even better!  I'll update if there's problems.

Reviews.Title: What a deal!!
Reviews.Author: Miss picky buyer
Reviews.Content: We've had this set for several days and are still tinkering with settings and trading out cables. The picture is amazing for barely $300. Features are pretty easy to navigate, even for a novice. Sound quality leaves a little to be desired, but most homes choose to add speakers, anyway. We are very pleased with this purchase as well as the service from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: tcl
Reviews.Author: uncus
Reviews.Content: The TV. is a good one,picture good so is the sound. The only problem I've run into, is; Tv does not work well with direct TV, The remote does not allow for use with the Direct TV remotes.

Reviews.Title: save your money do not buy TCL horrible support!
Reviews.Author: odiegh
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv and for the size, 1080 and hookups. However after a month or so the hookups hdmi, vga, everything stopped working. I called tcl and got another number to call. Nothing happened as they said. After numerous calls the part finally arrived. I called back to schedule the tech and they said it was dispatched no one called for a cpl days so i called back 2 more times and finally a tech showed up. He then proceeded to do nothing but say it was not the part shipped and the tv needed the main board replaced and it had to be shipped. He did call tcl and a box was suppose to be sent to ship the tv in but after a month it never arrived. Numerous attempts to reach often end up in disconnection.

Reviews.Title: TCL Should Be TLC
Reviews.Author: BONEZ
Reviews.Content: For the price of this TV I have nothing to complain about.. the picture is extremely high in quality and I have already been recommending it to friends and business associates..

Reviews.Title: Made A Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Adamtron
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV as a gift for my mother.  She was very impressed and happy with it.  Turned out to be great quality and the perfect size.  I highly recommend this item to anyone who is looking for a large TV on a budget.  It is 1080p and less expensive than what I paid for a 720p TV a few years back. I highly recommend this item to anyone who is looking for a large TV on a budget.

Reviews.Title: HAVING TROUBLE FINDING CUSTOMER SERVICE
Reviews.Author: cooner
Reviews.Content: First off, I really do like this tv.  It's got a nice price tag, and that one reason I purchased this over something like Sony or Samsung or any of the more popular brands.Second, I give this a 3 star because I can't seem to find an email address to contact TCL to write them about an issue I'm having with Blu-ray at the moment.  Because this is my first HDTV, I'm not really sure if this is normal or not.  Here's what I wrote in my email to them:"Hi,I recently purchased a TCL 40" HDTV off Amazon.com, and I have noticed something that is a little peculiar about the picture quality.First off, I bought the tv in order to watch Star Wars on Blu-ray (so yes, I also have a Blu-ray player).  I watched the first 2 movies and didn't notice anything, but when I was watching the 3rd and 4th movies (thus far, I haven't tried the last 2), my brother and I noticed the quality shift between being really clear and kind of gritty (almost like older films will look like).  It's most noticeable while looking at a plain background during the movies, but up close it can still be seen.  I'm unsure of how to describe it really, but I was wondering if all HDTVs have something like this occur?  Or if it might just be the one I own?  I have yet to try other Blu-ray videos so I'm not sure if this is an isolated incident concerning the video choice or not.  But I will try to watch other films on Blu-ray and watch out for this same problem.  If you have any information for me regarding this issue, please let me know."Again, I'm unsure if this is normal or not, but it can be distracting when watching a video.  If anyone has had this happen and if there is a way to fix it, please let me know.  You can contact me at aquatec1234@hotmail.com.  Just make sure to write in the subject line something to do with this issue.  Or you can just comment on this review.  Thanks in advance.Other than that, I've been enjoying playing videogames on my tv...haven't really watched anything on it yet...I'm currently not using it to watch tv.  Just playing games and watching movies.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: mnmc
Reviews.Content: TV has performed wonderfully.  Great picture for the amount of money it costs.  Would recommend this purchase.  Easy to set up and run.

Reviews.Title: works great!
Reviews.Author: amazon#1fan
Reviews.Content: I got this back in December for 249. Just love it. Best buy I've made in years! I would recommend this to anyone. Great picture and sound.Update- 2-28-12Still working wonderfully! I watch it every night and still can't get over the price! It has a better picture than my $3000.00 Samsung!!!!

Reviews.Title: Lots of features for the money
Reviews.Author: Shane King
Reviews.Content: I like this TV. There are all of the in an outs I needed and it looks great. The speakers are so-so but once I get my whole system setup I won't care about that and I wasn't expecting super high quality for built in speakers anyway. I especially like that there are controls on the side of the unit so if your remote stops working you can still make the TV function.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: HOME2VA
Reviews.Content: Took a risk on this unit at $299 hoping it would be 'good enough' and it certainly is.  Rapid setup, no issues with need for firmware upgrade.  The digital tuner picked up all the cable passthrough re-broadcat (over air HD) channels that my Samsumg unit downstairs does, a big deal to me since that what I wanted this unit on the bedroom wall for and had no desire to add a cable box (and no TV anymore offers two RF/coax inputs for straight cable and an OTA antenna).  HD picture is excellent, blue ray exceptional - just outstanding for the price of the set.Bought a Sony BDV-E780W blu-ray surround system to connect this to but was surprised how good the built in speakers were versus expectations.  Our bedroom is 29' x 16' and with this on a middle wall half the time I dont even turn on the Sony system for basic TV watching.Can't say enough for the value for what was paid for this unit, but nothing is perfect.  A couple things to note if they are a huge deal for you.  There isn't a user selectable picture size adjustment and the range or picture color, brightness, backlight adjustments seem limited, you notice but it hasn't been a problem.  Unless I am doing something wrong, it does not appear that the HDMI in this set supports the ARC (audio return channel) and does not have an optical/digital port - thus the audio to the surround system is through the digital audio (coaxial) out, certainly a 'better' versus 'best' connection option.It's been on the wall almost a month now performing above expectations.

Reviews.Title: TCL 40 inch review
Reviews.Author: Mac
Reviews.Content: The price of this TV is great!  There are 3 HDMI slots to connect all of my devices and other ports to connect items.  The picture and sound quality are outstanding.  I had my reservations when buying this TV, due to never hearing of the manufacturer.  I did my research and I was satisfied by what I read.  I am glad I decided to purchase this TV.  I have recommended this TV to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Corsily
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for 299 with free two day shipping. I couldn't beat the price I certainly did my research too. This is what made me buy it because I was on a budget. I must say I am pressed with the tv. In my opinion it's just as a good as a name brand tv.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: potny
Reviews.Content: What can I say.  I got this for $300, got  to my house in 7 days.  I've had it now for a couple of months. The thing was a great buy, great picture, all around great buy, I would pay up to $400 for another one.The cable box is hooked up through HDMI, the XBox 360 through Component, and a set of speakers with a sub, this thing really is very impressive if you can pick it up for a good price.

Reviews.Title: TCL L40FHDF12TA is awsome for the price!
Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on the 18th of January 2012, so I haven't had it long yet, but so far its been great! The base was a little tricky to get on, but other than that its been awesome. The picture quality is real nice. I don't find the sound that bad from the speakers in the TV, but I will be connecting a home theater to it. It does contain the Samsung logo and # on the panel on the inside of the back upper right corner like the other reviewers have stated.Shipped overnight for 3.99 with Prime! You can't beat that!  I received it by 2:00PM the next day.I would recommend this TV to anyone looking for a budget set. With Amazons return policy, even if you get a defective unit  I am sure they will make it right.TCL L40FHDF12TA 40-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LCD HDTV with 2-Year Warranty,

Reviews.Title: tcl
Reviews.Author: Michael C. Flynn "shoflypie"
Reviews.Content: I never heard of this company before but decided to buy it anyway. The quality of the picture is excellent and the price was outstanding.

Reviews.Title: beautiful and very clear and functional TV!
Reviews.Author: Wills
Reviews.Content: this is a great TV! The picture is very clear and bright. The sound is very good and the setup a breeze.Delivery was excellent!

Reviews.Title: TCL 40-inch 1080p
Reviews.Author: flipper
Reviews.Content: So far the TV is working great its only been one month but no problems yet will get back to you in about a year.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: katg
Reviews.Content: No complaints yet. I've had the TV for a month and hasn't caused me any issues. No one believes i only payed $299 for it! If you are particular about theatric sound, you might want to think about purchasing a sound system. Sound as is works great for me!UPDATE 1/10/14- Over 2 years later and it still works great! It was worth every penny. I'm still working on getting a  sound system. ONly  complaint. I haven't moved the tv in these 2 years, but when i do, i'll be extra careful.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal Great Product
Reviews.Author: vballmilk
Reviews.Content: My brother bought the 32 inch television and i played around with it and it was awesome.  So i was gonna buy the same tv, then i saw the 40 inch for only 50 bucks more and i jumped on it.  The screws were a little hard to get in for the tv stand, but i eventually got it.  Definitley buy this tv if you want a great image and great deal!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: TEB
Reviews.Content: Great TV.Does exactly what I expected.Crisp picture, good color out of the box.Family bought two after seeing mine.

Reviews.Title: For the cheapest I could find, pretty darn good
Reviews.Author: PapaJohn
Reviews.Content: I bought this for use as a computer monitor for presentations to small groups.  Bottom line it works well and is very sharp and clear and a small group can see clearly at 1920x1080 resolution which was my goal.Several specific observations:1) I can set the resolution at 1920x1080 using componet video (RGB) input.  This is how I have it set up, as the second of two monitors attached to my PC running Windows7.  I also use it as the PC's speakers using the RCA audio inputs.2) Using VGA input there is a quirky issue.  If I power on my computer connected to a different monitor at 1920x1080, and then switch the cable to the TCL display, the TCL monitor displays 1920x1080 just fine.  But if the computer re-detects the monitor (e.g. after rebooting) it sets it to 12??x768 and will not allow higher settings (even after checking a Windows option to allow settings that the monitor does not support). I think that this is a firmware issue with the TV and if the TCL monitor reported to Windows that it supported the higher resolution that it would work.  TCL phone support just said that the 768 resolution was the highest it supported with a VGA connection.  They said "best" performance required an HDMI connection, but could not say that this would solve the issue.  I have not tried using the HDMI input because I do not have a DVI-to-HDMI (DVI being standard computer digital video output) cable, but I know that they are available.  But as I said it works OK using the composite input on the monitor.  I use the SVIDEO output of the computer along with a break-out cable that provides the separate RGB cables.3) Regardless of how I connect the TCL monitor, at 1920x1080 I lose a little desktop on all four edges.  This would be a big problem if it was the only monitor attached to the computer, but since I have it set as my "second" monitor it is not a big problem.4) Since it is after all a TV I just had to go buy a $10 indoor antenna, and in my city office it receives about 25 over-the-air stations just fine, with good picture quality.  I just don't know if any NCAA basketball tournament games will be available on the stations I get :-)

Reviews.Title: Surprising quality for the price.
Reviews.Author: Cora R. Bauer "Crazycook"
Reviews.Content: I bought this because of the low price. I was more than a little surprised by the quality. Great picture,decent audio and a wealth of features. Added a sound bar and blu-ray player. Perfect for our sunroom.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Warren T. Trollinger "KingDork"
Reviews.Content: This is my first HD TV. I am using a Samsung CT-550 dvd surround system which can upconvert to 1080p, or 1080i. The remote sucks, I hate it, the RCA code did not work with the Samsung remote.The picture is great. Kudos to Fed Ex, they delivered it fast and in one piece. My set was not DOA as many reported and the unit came with the newest firmware update. If I have anything happen before my 30 days are up I will edit this review.In my opinion, times are tough, for the money I am very happy, even with the crappy remote.

Reviews.Title: TCL 40-Inch TV
Reviews.Author: Patti Frazier
Reviews.Content: For the money, this is a very good TV.  The picture is really clear.  I would recommend it to anyone looking for good TV but doesn't have alot of money to spend.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: B F
Reviews.Content: I ordered three 40 inch TCL TVs from Amazon.com for $260. I received them all about 3 days ahead of the delivery schedule, with free shipping. Each TV came packaged in a cardboard crate. I set up all three TVs to test them and found no dead parts of the screen and nothing apparently wrong with them. When I first turned on the TV I was simply just amazed at the clarity and detail of the HD channels. Everything looks as fantastic as my friend's $1000 42 inch Panasonic! The sound is a little lacking in quality and clarity but the picture is just plain fantastic! I would recommend this TV to anyone in the market for a HD TV.

Reviews.Title: An excellent TV with a great price.
Reviews.Author: Karl J Truty
Reviews.Content: Nice TV!!!  Great picture!  Lots of inputs. Killer price. Handsome appearance.  Easy to use menu system.  Would def recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Price leader
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Siebert "Video worm"
Reviews.Content: I've had this unit up and running for three weeks.  Setup took about 15 minutes (using the recommended settings from other folks who reviewed this unit).  I doubt if you can find a better 40" flat screen under $500.00.  I paid under 300 including shipping.  The picture is bright and sharp, and although the built-in speakers are a little thin, there are enough outputs on the set to get your sound system cranking without problems.  There is a little bleedthrough on the edge (especially the upper left corner), however it seems to be visable only on startup on a black screen.  The base is sturdy, and holds the unit steady (even with the dogs running into the cabinet).  The 60 Hz rating does allow some minor ghosting on action sequences in videos, but for the most part I'm a CNN junky so It's not a problem.  I would recommend this TV, and I would buy another.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: June Conradi
Reviews.Content: Wanted to get rid of the large, heavy old tv for a lightweight flat screen so chose this one.  It arrived while my husband was having surgery so was not able to hook it up until we had visitors come and do that for us.  It is great.  Meets all of our expectations. So far I have not been able to hook up the hdmi cable as our dish doesn't seem to have a hook up for it so need to find out why.  The picture is great anyway so will be pleased even if we can't hook up the hdmi cable. I love purchasing from Amazon. It gives me opportunity to think about the purchase, read reviews and decide from home.  The price can't be beat!

Reviews.Title: cant beat it
Reviews.Author: Bishop
Reviews.Content: This is why I shop on Amazon! I couldn't believe to get this quality of a TV for the price

Reviews.Title: TCL L40FHDF12TA 40-Inch LCD
Reviews.Author: JNT in LA
Reviews.Content: Purchased this unit for my 75 yr. old mother. Replaced a 25 yr. old CRT SDTV.Amazon rocks! Ordered on 12/23/11 at 4:35 A.M. Unit arrived with free shipping on afternoon of 12/24/11. I believe they must have been storing them around the corner!!!Mom is ecstatic! No issues so far!This unit fits the bill for the economy minded casual viewer. Purchased this unit after another good experience buying one for my 26 yr. old daughter in last year's 32" model. She's happy still!With the 30 day exchange from Amazon you can't go wrong here!

Reviews.Title: Great purchase - excellent picture
Reviews.Author: hbcondors
Reviews.Content: Thanks Amazon. Bought this as a gift for my folk's anniversary as they had a beast of a Sony tube TV (ok picture but ridiculous size- even by old tube standards) and so far so great! My dad loved watching football this past weekend and it looks great withe the ROKU 1080p streaming as well.Anyone know if TCL is still using Samsung panels for their sets? I looked but couldn't find anything that indicated int was a Samsung...either way, GREAT picture and sound...can't go wrong with this one...

Reviews.Title: Works Great, good price good TV
Reviews.Author: DeltaNine
Reviews.Content: I don't usually write reviews due to the waste of time, but given the fact i relied on them so much when deciding to buy this TV i thought I would add my to the batch..I use it as  monitor / TV, Mounted on a wall. Works perfect. Was skeptical due to negative reviews but worked out well for me so far. It has been working for past month. I use it for gaming and tv mostly as well as web surfing.I got the mount: $25AVF EL404B-A Multi Position Dual Arm TV Mount for 25-Inch to 40-Inch Screens (Black)Mount works well for me but a piece broke during installation. I would recommend a more hefty mount than this one unless you are handy with the tools, stud finder scanner, and have tools and better screws than provided due to the size of TV, I used different longer/ stronger screws into the wall, just to be safe.But the Mount itself is amazing.. moves in ever direction i need it.Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: 40 inch TV 1080p
Reviews.Author: D. Brink
Reviews.Content: TCL L40FHDF12TA 40-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LCD HDTV with 2-Year WarrantyThis tv has a great picture and good sound.Worked right out of the boxThe price was great. Has lots of inputs.I was looking for a TV with internet ready,but for the price, I plan on adding a WIFI Blue Ray Player. I would buy it again.I want to thank Amazon for the quick delivery

Reviews.Title: Good picture quality
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: I do not watch TV very often, so just bought this for some TV programs using an antenna. So far enjoying it. Good picture quality. and the backlight can automatically adjust according to the ambient light. good feature. and rest assured with the 2 year warranty

Reviews.Title: Finally
Reviews.Author: Charles J ""Charlie"
Reviews.Content: It's a really good buy.  However, the first TV I received did not work, it had half a screen on the TV.  Therefore, I had to return it and did receive another.  This was actually an easy process and was as quick as I would have been able to return to a store.  Very easy hook-up and has a lot of features, but we are pretty simple so we probably will not use most of the connections.  It's a good buy.  So I'm thinking about getting another for my daughter.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: John S
Reviews.Content: I bought this on major sale at Christmas time and thought for the price even if it's not the greatest TV it won't matter, but I have to say I have been very happy with the product.  The picture is first rate on HD.

Reviews.Title: Better than I thought
Reviews.Author: lisa4labz "lisa4labz"
Reviews.Content: I was able to get in on the $259.99 deal Dec. 23rd and selected free shipping option thinking it would arrive after Xmas sometime but couldn't believe tracking info showed it being delivered Dec. 24th.  Sure enough 9am on Christmas Eve it was on my front porch!I have no regrets getting this set and had it hooked up to an HD box and it's picture perfect.  Even without the HD the picture was good.  Did a little bit of tweaking that I read about.  I got my son the 32" and he loves it too!  We have a Samsung 52" in our family room hooked up to HD and the picture is just as good.  I'm not a TV expert but I don't notice a difference between this one and my daughter's LG and our Sammy hooked up to HD.  Sound is great so unless you're a TV connoisseur and can find something wrong with this I'd say try it and buy it!

Reviews.Title: TCL 40in LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Michigan2012
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for a steal price. I absolutely love the picture and have had no problems with dead pixels or shadowing of any sort. We play our blue rays and are amazed by the quality. The only HUGE negative is that the 2 HDMI inputs in the back of the TV DO NOT WORK!!!!!!!!!! The one on the side of the TV works perfectly, but the other two are just not functioning. I have read many reviews about updating the firmware, but most people say their TV went blank after doing so and did not show a picture anymore. So for right now I am not going to update it, because I am hoping they will fix that glitch in the software. Cannot return, because I bought this product when I was overseas, and came back a little over a month after I had purchased it, so my 30-guarantee was not in effect anymore. I love this TV, especially for the price I paid, I just REALLY wish the HDMI's would work!!!! Has ANYONE had any luck updating them?ProsGood PictureGood Sound (We have a big open living room and we dont even turn it up to half way, since the sound is nice and clear)3 HDMI inputsPrice- cant beat it.Cons2 out of 3 HDMI inputs do not work.UPDATEAfter calling the TCL service hotline I was also upscaled to a service level 2... They gave me a number to call which I did. I could not believe that this call was transferred to someone's home or a place that seemed to be having a party. The lady on the phone was VERY unprofessional. I explained my situation to her (none of the ports in the back of the tv work). She then asked me to send my Amazon receipt via email, and as soon as I do that she would send a part which should be there within a week. After getting the part I would then contact someone who will install it for me... Needless to say it is now 3, yes 3 MONTHS later! I have yet to get anything in the mail or even an email saying something like "Sorry about the delay" Absolutely nothing! It is ridiculous! I really like the picture of this TV, especially on ATTs Uverse HD channels.. But it is very frustrating to switch the HDMI cables back and forth between Uverse and BlueRay.

Reviews.Title: No issues
Reviews.Author: DeereLover
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV a few days before Christmas, 2011.  I chose 'standard shipping' and expected the TV to arrive sometime between Christmas and New Years.  To my amazement, the item arrived on Christmas Eve.  Thanks, Amazon and FedEx for exceeding my expectations!This TV is a secondary TV in our home.  It's used in the basement by my kids for watching TV, movies and playing the Wii console.  We have not experienced any problems with this unit in the first 30 days.

Reviews.Title: Good little tv
Reviews.Author: MEK
Reviews.Content: This is a good little tv for the price. I've been very happy with it. Cannot beat the price.  Very good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Jonathan "Anime Enthusiast"
Reviews.Content: There's a reason this is the number 1 best selling TV on Amazon (at time of writing) - the price.I'd give this TV 4 stars on its own - there are a couple missing features I'd like - such as PIP and 24p True Cinema, but you're not going to get that for at least $100 more than this set costs.Overall, I'm happy with it - and it looks great - I have a 32" LG 1080p TV and the picture quality is equivalent.  That plus the $100 I kept in my pocket makes me a satisfied 5 star review writer.I don't care about sound or tuning, I just use a Roku and PS3 and have a sound system for sound, so the TV stays on the same input and I turned the speakers off.This will hold me over until I can get a passive glasses 3D LED 40"+ set for under $500.

Reviews.Title: This gift was LOVED!!
Reviews.Author: S. Schoellman "Mom of  3"
Reviews.Content: My mother-in-law got this for her mother for Christmas. We received this t.v. really quickly after purchase and it is great quality.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Robert Miletich
Reviews.Content: I have purchased this TV for several rental properties; in short it is an excellent TV (I have purchased maybe 10 HDTVs over the last three years). The picture is clear; good contrast; easy setup, lots of HDMIs and other inputs.It does not have internet capability and the USB port functionality is limited, but streaming devices like ROKU are a better deal than having those features built into the TV. I have several Vizio VIA capable TVs and although it has internet, streaming and internet apps built in, they are also FAR buggier than standalone streaming devices like ROKU.I highly recommend this 40" TV, both for value and quality.

Reviews.Title: great for amason
Reviews.Author: dan t
Reviews.Content: shipping was fast. first one did not work. called customer care for tlc and that was a joke. got a hold of some nice lady out in oregan and had new tv in 2 days. she mailed me ups label for defective one. done. amason did great, give that lady a bonus,will be back! dan t

Reviews.Title: Great value, but some flaws
Reviews.Author: Satisfied
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV at $300 and it is a great value.  Picture is very good.  No complaints about the sound.
